Demand for such tools is very broad all over the world, including segments such as transportation, out-of-home marketing, tourism, events, and smart cities.

name: The Euler Foundation
description:
The Euler Foundation promotes the global development, distribution and adoption of heterogeneous infrastructures with community members around the world. It is setup to provide an independent home for the Euler Platform, with the intention of hosting more diverse open source projects in the future.

The goal of the Euler Foundation is to serve developers, users, and the entire ecosystem by providing a set of shared resources to build community, facilitate collaboration and support integration of open source technologies. Primary activities include maintaining the Euler Network, organizing large-scale test infrastructures, community management, public education and bringing together technology enthusiasts each year at global events.

Euler is the first technology to support Outcome Economies, meaning merchants and customers can interact and exchange value based on behavioral trends. The combination of Euler’s AI, IoTN and Nexus Contracts is what creates an Outcome Economy. Customers will be charged by how much they use or consume, IoT will provide new purchasing opportunities while the StackChain facilitates contractual agreements governing the use of these devices when connected to the Euler network. Manufacturers can now create new sale streams that will be based on usage and real time customer behavior.
short_description: Information Technology & Services

description:

name: Foundation AutonomisHome
description:
OUR VISION

Benevolence is the state of mind that charactises the AutonomisHome Foundation in its mission to help and its desire to shorten distance so as to bring a little more humanity to people in need of assistance in their search for autonomy.

The Foundation is mostly destined to elderly people confronted to an autonomy loss and who desire to stay at home whilst benefitting from an increased comfort and security in their environment.

An unforeseen event, like a fall, or the slow evolution of an illness can lead to a great diminution of autonomy. The short-term consequences can be felt at a personal level impacting directly on comfort and security. An uprooting, or a profound change of environment, is sometimes considered as necessary. Elderly people are particularly sensitive to the stability of their environment and a profound change is often experienced as a form of trauma.

The recent technological developments give them access to tools that allow them to maintain a benevolent and discrete presence, at a distance from their home, from their family or institutions.

OUR MISSION

The AutonomisHome Foundation seeks to reinforce the autonomy of elderly people struggling to maintain their quality of life and that through the counsel and/or the financing of technical solutions.

OUR GOAL

First of all, the AutonomisHome Foundation offers advice on the most pertinent technical solutions proposed for promoting the reinforcement of autonomy at home. The issues that elderly people faces such as handicap, pathologies, mobility, etc in relation to their home must be considered in order to find the best solution. The impact of these solutions in terms of change is evaluated regarding the reinforcement of autonomy and the expected improvement of both their comfort and their security. Moreover, the respect of their private life and privacy must be preserved through technological choices that are the least invasive.

The costs of this solution are evaluated and the AutonomisHome Foundation can, on request of an accredited organism, offer a partial or complete fund for this solution.

The Foundation delivers a label that certifies not only the accreditation, but also the guarantee that the setting up of the autonomy supporting system and, especially its integration in a program of home care, will be truly efficient. The funds will only be transferred to public, semi-public or private institutions that are accredited by the Foundation in Switzerland.
short_description: The AutonomisHome Foundation seeks to reinforce the autonomy of elderly people struggling to maintain their quality of life.

It is a bio-imaging technology designed to accelerate the drug development process & provide solutions to problems associated with species cross-reactivity, animal testing & understanding human disease. This has been achieved by using proprietary protocols on primary human cells, allowing the mechanism of action & translational relevance of a drug to be defined very early on in the development process.

MesenFlow Technologies has recently extended this technology for use in cosmetics and nutrition. By using their technology, it is possible to explore the physiological impact of a cosmetic or nutraceutical candidate in the early development phase. Their services are particularly tailored to business environments where animal-free testing is mandatory, and an understanding of impact on human biology is paramount.

We have developed minimally viable prototypes for neurovascular, orthopedic and dental applications. short_description: Lumigbo developes a technology to build up implants inside the body using an access channel.

name: HAYA Therapeutics
description: Heart failure as a consequence of myocardial fibrosis is the world’s biggest killer and represents a significant unmet medical need. No therapies currently exist that either directly target the heart or the fibrotic process itself. We have discovered a heart specific regulator of fibrosis – the long noncoding RNA, Wisper. By using our first-in-class proprietary approach to target Wisper, we are able to block myocardial fibrosis and treat heart failure in pre-clinical animal models.
short_description: HT is dedicated to treating heart failure through the discovery and development of innovative first-in-class RNA-based therapeutics.

GliaPharm is a Swiss biotechnology company active in the development of treatments for neurological and psychiatric diseases.

Their story began when Galina's parents gave Dan a pair of traditional Russian "Valenkis". In the past, these Russian felted boots were essential to fight the Siberian cold. So after trying them out in the snow, Galina and Dan had an idea! Why not preserve the "Valenki" ancestral know-how and create a revised pair of 100% wool shoes?

That's when the first BAABUK pair of shoes was born, and they didn't stop there...
short_description: BAABUK creates authentic wool footwear for responsible human beings.

name: Dicronis
description:

The first product in their pipeline, Lymphit, measures patient’s lymphatic function in a safe, home-based and highly scalable manner. The initial indication of Lymphit is the earliest possible diagnosis of secondary lymphedema, a serious side effect of many cancer therapies.

By remotely monitoring the lymphatic function, the physician is enabled for the first time to perform an early diagnosis, before the swelling has occurred, and evaluate the best conservative treatment for the patient.

This leads to a great improvement of the prognosis and quality of life of the patient and important savings for the healthcare system and society.
short_description: Dicronis develops microneedles for diagnostic purposes.

name: Vivere.travel
description:
Vivere.travel, a digital destination discovery platform, believes that nothing has the power to influence vacation plans like beautifully curated, personalized content.

An intersection between Google Destinations trip planning feature and The Lonely Planet, backed by the AI technology of IBM Watson, Vivere is developing a web-based travel inspiration platform which aims to guide travelers to their ideal travel destinations in just a few clicks.

Our goal:

To inspire and help these potential travelers to find the perfect destination for their vacation, holiday or adventure.
To connect customers who are already interested in traveling with stunning destinations. 
To help hotels get seen by their ideal audience - who are already segmented, inspired and interested in booking with them. 

About Vivere.travel:

Vivere.travel is a revolutionary online visual experience that accompanies travelers on every step of their journey, helping them to search, discover and book the destination that most fully matches their interests and wishes. Vivere.travel is part of Positioner, a team of communications and marketing experts, with a deep knowledge in the digital communication industry, dedicated to outstanding travel and hospitality brands.

What Vivere.travel offers:

A free web platform which guides travelers who are looking for inspiration on their next destination. Based on a ranking algorithm and AI analysis, Vivere personalizes, suggests destinations along with beautiful proprietary photos and comprehensive travel guides.

Matteo De Santis, CEO of Vivere.travel, explains: 

“Vivere.travel is a predominantly a visual experience. Using our online platform, customers enter information about their interests, planned dates of travel and budgets, and we present stunning photos, videos and guides of destinations that match their unique preferences. Our aim is to help customers find and book the destinations and hotels that attract them most. After all, a picture paints a thousand words.” He concludes: “Supported by IBM Watson technology, we are confident that we will be able to deliver exquisitely curated content that appeals to every kind of traveler, and change the way that people plan and book vacations for the better.”
short_description: A smart, easy way to discover beautiful destinations.

name: Vovx
description:
VOVOX manufactures premium audio cables for musical instruments, recording studios and hi-fi systems.
The clearer the sound that reaches the ear, the more it moves us. Because all of us at VOVOX are passionate about music, they decided to develop sound conductors: cables optimized to transmit audio signals as purely as possible.
An audio concept must measure up to the human ear. That is why a sound difference that can be measured but not heard, is irrelevant for us. Relevant sound solutions, however, are important for us, even if they contradict common knowledge. They don't want to turn cables into objects of worship: but the blind tests do show a real difference in sound.
For the best possible signal transmission, they have a wide range of sound conductors for all applications in the audio chain - from the internal wiring of the amplified musical instrument to the loudspeakers at home. It is also their concern to contribute to an improvement in the quality of audio recordings with the use of their products.
The development of perfect sound conductors is an ongoing process and they value the experience and input of their customers and partners. This information is being combined with their research in the constant development and improvement of their products.
short_description: Manufactures premium audio cables for musical instruments, recording studios and hi-fi systems.

name: SensArs
description:
There are almost 5 millions of amputees, and even more nerve-injured persons, only in the USA and Europe. Together with commonly present neuropathic pain, and lost limb function (nerve injuries), they have no perception or control of the force required to hold or pick up objects and cannot feel their shape or consistency (when using prostheses). A century after the first prosthesis, electrodes, electronics and surgical expertise can be merged into the life-changing solution.

Our venture is a synergistic effort converging expertise from microtechnologies, algorithms, electronics and clinical experimentation. We are an EPFL-based startup, founded by Francesco Petrini, Stanisa Raspopovic, and Silvestro Micera.

Our mission is to re-enable upper, lower-limb amputees and nerve-damaged persons by:

Restoring their complete sensory-motor functionality.
Diminishing phantom limb pain.
Enabling them to feel the artificial limb as part of their own body.

From a market viewpoint, the nerve-injured persons do not have effective ways for function restoration, so we are proposing a novel tech and therefore generating a new market. As for amputees, the prosthetic limbs are getting more sophisticated but lack sensory feedback. We are constructing the game-changing functional improvement of the technology that will become the essential feature of the next-generation of prosthesis.

Amputees and peripheral nerve damaged persons are in constant increase, mainly due to diabetes, car accidents, work injuries and wars. Among the most disabling consequences of these is the interruption of sensations flow from extremities to the brain.  The absence of feedback and the perception of prosthesis as a foreign body are the primary reason for refusal to use prosthesis. Amputees cannot feel the shape or material of objects they are holding and have no perception of the force required to hold or pick up objects. Nerve-injured persons often have completely functionally unusable limbs. In 50-80% of cases, amputees and nerve-injured experience neuropathic pain from the missing part of the limb and drugs do not provide adequate relief. Providing them with an adequate sensory feedback would solve their problems.
short_description: SensArs restores limb functionalities to people affected by extremities amputation or nerve damages.

name: Liquineq AG
description:
Banking the World via the Blockchain
Liquineq is a Ethereum-based financial software to be used by banks and other financial institutions. It shall enable real-time, peer-to-peer value exchange and payment services across borders and other silos, and between fiat money, other asset classes, and decentralized currencies. It's designed to enable financial inclusion and partnering with existing banking institutions, access will be made available to everyone via the Liquineq network.
​
Customers can set up and fund an account with a bank using Liquineq in minutes  by simply downloading the Liquineq mobile wallet and answering a few simple questions.  Also linked to the wallet are debit cards, allowing instant access to funds deposited with a bank.

Performance: 

Liquineq starts at the top with a enhanced-performance Ethereum-based blockchain that can globally exchange value via a utility token called Liquideum, but with transactional performance that orders of magnitude faster than classic Ethereum that rivals and exceeds the capability of current networks including Visa, Swift, and PayPal with instant settlement and low transfer costs.   

Security: 

Built into the Liquineq network and every transfer is integral KYC and AML technology, ensuring the legal use of the network and safety for those who need to know with whom they are transacting.  In addition, lost or stolen tokens and wallets are recoverable without the need for radical processes like blockchain forking via a secure process for lost token reissuing.

Partnerships: 

On this foundation Liquineq partners with banking institutions to provide a Local blockchain-based solution where funds denominated in local currencies can be stored by trusted local institutions or sent anywhere in the world instantly and as needed at transfer costs less than 10% of typical international transfer costs. 

The Liquineq Blockchains

The blockchain-based solution provides services for a decentralized exchange, liquidity provider mechanisms, a clearinghouse messaging network, and a gateway to asset-backed currency-specific local blockchains. Both the Liquineq Liquideum and Local blockchains are highly scalable with a Proof-of-Trust consensus that is bonded by the activities of the chains themselves. The network is designed as a highly performant system leveraging local Liquineq blockchain providers to support the Liquideum Global network.  While the value of the Liquideum Token floats, specific mechanisms are integral that both stabilize this price to minimize volatility as well as ensure lightning-fast transactions to further minimize the impact of pricing volatility, unlike other tokens.
short_description: Blockchain-based solution for global banking

name: FRESCO
description:
FRESCO is the world's first blockchain-based trust distribution network.

FRESCO allows art collectors, dealers, organizations to display their collection strength as well as evaluating that of others. FRESCO tokens (FRES) represents the trust each art participant put upon his or her collected artwork.

Trust tokenization will simplify the myriad trust verification process of art industry and expand the existing global art collecting scene. As a result, art participants can individually allocate a certain amount of FRESCO tokens (FRES) to each artwork they own and thus keep a record of their art collection strength on their blockchain address.

FRESCO comes to the market at a crucial time. Advancement of blockchain technology has created a perfect opportunity to bring more trust and validity to the art industry.

FRESCO’s trust tokenization together with a platform built on an open decentralized data-base, opens the art market to a broader pool of art investors.
short_description: Blockchain Art Asset Network.

name: Lymphatica Medtech
description:
Lymphatica Medtech is a medical device development company developing a minimally invasive solution for chronic lymphedema.

Lymphedema is the chronic swelling that generally occurs in the arms or the legs.

Lymphedema is most commonly caused by the removal of or the damage to the lymph nodes as a part of cancer treatment. It results from a blockage in the lymphatic system, which is part of the immune system. The blockage prevents the lymphatic system from draining excess fluids, and the fluid buildup leads to swelling, infections, and pain.

Unfortunately, there is no cure for lymphedema. It can be managed with early diagnosis and diligent care of the affected limb, through daily compression, bandages, and manual drainage sessions. From the moment of the diagnosis, the life of lymphedema patients changes forever.

Cancer and cancer-related interventions (i.e. surgery, radiotherapy) are frequent causes of lymphedema occurring both in the upper and lower limbs. Breast cancer survivors are at high risk for developing lymphedema, as well as patients treated for melanoma, pelvic and head and neck cancer or other cancer treatments that require lymph node dissection. Physical trauma can also result in lymphedema, a major cause of lymphatic disease among wounded veterans.

Lymphedema is associated with significantly impaired quality of life, skin changes, increased risk of infection and in rare cases lymphedema itself may undergo malignant transformation.

Lymphatica offers a permanent solution that will allow patients to regain their normal lifestyle.
short_description: Lymphatica Medtech is a medical device development company developing a minimally invasive solution for chronic lymphedema.

name: HIT Foundation
description: The Health Information Traceability (HIT) Foundation offers a blockchain-based online marketplace for personal health data that allows individuals to trace data usage and participate in its monetization. The individual is the one granting access to his data under a smart contract that determines the conditions of the data usage by information seekers such as market researchers, academic institutions or hospitals. HIT Foundation is the first ecosystem that allows everybody to get rewarded for sharing health information digitally instead of paying others to process or store it. The HIT token is used as an incentive and aligns the motivation of all network participants. At the same time, blockchain technology allows to maintain the privacy of the user/patient. The distributed system supports the global execution of new or existing business cases for information seekers on top of the HIT platform without the need for intermediaries.

name: BGX
description:
BGX is a multifunctional processing platform powered by artificial intelligence for the mobile games mar-ket. With a diverse set of monetary features and games-related revenue mechanisms, BGX is the most complete financial ecosystem for the mobile games industry in the world.

The BGX infrastructure consists of an artificial neural network (ANN), integrating a Cross Currency Control Engine, a Tokenization Genesis Module, and Smart Order Routing to provide multichannel monetization and cryptofinance services to all mobile game ecosystem participants.

BGX offers users access to Smart Gaming Revenues, Universal ID, Instant Reporting, Player Overdraft Mod-ule, Virtual Cross-Currency Card, App Market 3.0 and the proprietary BIFROST Funding Module. Open-sourced and AI-driven, BGX aims to fully democratize and decentralize game revenues. Every participant gains fair access to financial and processing services.
The native BGX Token is the gas that drives the platform’s value. This value arises intrinsically from game developers and player participation. It manifests in IAP transactions and player overdraft ability, in cross-game-currency management, ad services, tournaments, streaming, and AR game modules.

BGX’s mission is to use the AI-powered processing platform amplified by game capabilities to democra-tize the multi-billion mobile games industry and to decentralize its revenues.
Your world. Your games. Your profits.

The company, which is headquartered in Malans, Switzerland holds more than 200 patents worldwide.

U-NICA operates globally and has three locations in Switzerland, and sales offices in Hong Kong and New York.

The company has a proven track record and extensive experience in managing challenging large projects globally with renowned industry leaders, all of them among the top market leaders in their respective sectors.

The company, with its former 4 technology divisions, was restructured and repositioned in 2015, and since then U-NICA Corporation is focusing on digital brand protection solutions and physical product security.

description:
swissmooh is owned by the leading independent Swiss dairy farmer‘s association mooh. As early as 1905, dairy farmers in the North-Eastern part of Switzerland founded the cooperative Milchverband Winterthur at today's headquarter of swissmooh and Nordostmilch. The purpose of the cooperative was to collectively sell the products made of the milk produced by the members of the cooperative. The cooperative's name and structure changed several times during its long history. However, the purpose and the strategic target of mooh and its daughter company swissmooh remains the same: To be a safe and sustainable sales channel for their farmers.

The mooh dairy farmers are proud to market their premium dairy products through their own sales channel swissmooh to foreign countries like China and Thailand, and introduce Swiss dairy to consumers all over the world.

name: TwentyGreen
description:
The start-up TwentyGreen® produces a new probiotic feed supplement for sustainable animal farming, exerting several beneficial effects simultaneously. Their product is based on research in intestinal health at EPFL in Switzerland where they have identified a naturally occurring group of micro-organisms that enhance the quality of the gut ‘microbiota’, a consortium of symbiotic organisms colonizing the gastro-intestinal (GI) tract that are essential for metabolizing food and activating natural immune defenses.

TwentyGreen®’s aim is to gain a 10% share of the world animal feed probiotic market, which is worth over $4 billion per year and growing rapidly. Due to the important regulatory obligations involving human food and animal feed, commercialization of their feed supplement necessitates extensive R&D actions in collaboration with a highly competent academic partners such as EPFL.
short_description: TwentyGreen produces a new innovative probiotic feed supplement for sustainable animal farming.

As the market for micro-optics grew, SUSS MicroOptics expanded to meet the new and diverse requirements, developing its product portfolio and expertise to become one of the leading producers of precision refractive and diffractive micro-optics in the world.

SUSS MicroOptics is recognized by Carl Zeiss SMT GmbH as a Preferred Supplier and first became ISO 9001certified in 2008. In 2013 it moved to its current premises, complete with state-of-the-art cleanroom, from where it continues to deliver excellence to its international customer base.

name: Stemedica International
description:
Stemedica International S.A. was founded in 2008 as a global, biotechnology company that explores therapeutic applications of patented stem cells to treat degenerative diseases. In 2012 the Swiss Commission for Technology and Innovation (CTI) awarded Stemedica International and the Laboratory of Biomedical Optics at the École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) a grant to develop practical applications of stem cell therapies and brain imaging for Alzheimer’s disease. The grant is designed to facilitate and accelerate transition from academic and pre-clinical research to the clinical phase and, ultimately, commercial use of stem cell therapies in treating Alzheimer’s disease.

Stemedica International has an exclusive rights to manufacture and apply Stemedica’s allogeneic, ischemia-tolerant mesenchymal (itMSC) and neural (itNSC) stem cell lines and stem cell factors to create therapies for the treatment and prevention of Alzheimer’s disease and vascular dementia. The company also has Swissmedic licenses to import, export and distribute Stemedica’s cell lines worldwide for human use in approved clinical trials. Stemedica’s stem cell lines have a unique, proprietary technology based on the expansion of cells in constant hypoxia, which provides critical benefits in terms of safety, efficacy and scalability. Manufactured in compliance with cGMP, the technology is based on more than 30 years of research and clinical experience conducted by scientists and physicians in the United States, Europe and the former Soviet Union.

The company has headquarters in Lausanne, Switzerland, and a U.S. office in San Diego, California.
short_description: Stemedica International is a biotechnology company.

name: Stamfag
description:
Since 1883, Stamfag AG has been successfully producing puncture-piercing knives for the production of wet-strength paper, plastic and aluminum labels, playing cards and credit cards as well as many other materials. It has become a world leader in these areas. 

About 20 years ago, Stamfag AG launched a revolutionary punching knife. The newly developed punching knife brought the customer a multiple of punching performance with the highest accuracy and optimum service friendliness. The experts recognize this punching knife as "the original" consisting of a knife body and a cutting crown. 

In order to guarantee the continued existence of the company with this great know-how, Stamfag AG was sold in January 2011 to the company Leuthold Mechanik AG (HLM). This resulted in a change of domicile from Küsnacht to Einsiedeln. The development and production of the punching knives thus remains 100% in Switzerland.

Leuthold Mechanik AG, founded by the majority shareholder, Heinz Leuthold, in 1978, is the global market leader in the construction of tools and equipment for the aluminum packaging industry. With its state-of-the-art machinery, HLM manufactures the most demanding customer solutions in the areas of machine, apparatus and toolmaking.

For HLM Stamfag is a meaningful and logical extension of a prospering market segment. Thanks to the consistent use of existing synergies, the medium and long-term goals of the two companies can be achieved even better.
short_description: Stamfag produces a variety of ram-punch dies used in the process of manufacturing wet strength paper, and aluminum based labels.

name: Tenon Technology
description: Lower back pain is one of the most common types of back pain in adults and can be debilitating. There are many different diagnoses, but the sacroiliac (SI) joint is involved in more than 15% of cases. The joint connects the hip bones to the spinal column and as a consequence experiences constant strain. Inflammation of the SI joint is correspondingly painful. In chronic cases which are not well controlled by physiotherapy and painkillers, surgical fixation of the joint remains the only option. The market for SI joint fixation is large and is growing disproportionately compared to the back orthopaedic market as a whole
short_description: Tenon Technology AG develops implants for fixation of the sacroiliac joint.

name: orphanalytics
description:
OrphAnalytics brings the solution of text authentication capable of detecting ghostwriting issues. The developed solution is designed to identify the author of a text by comparing its style with other authors’ writings; only a few pages are necessary.

OrphAnalytics’ software adapt themselves to common languages in the professional world. They are now used to authenticate different types of documents. For instance, their software programs were used recently to expose the mechanism of a contractual fraud to an arbitral court.

The OrphAnalytics’ approach is independent of any specialized database. It is autonomously and confidentially implemented within an institution: the authenticated documents are not stored nor disclosed to third parties other than those in charge of their evaluation. (More information here).

The OrphAnalytics company offers a personalized service: adapting the software to an institution’s specific needs, training users to understand the results of authentication tests and offering expertise services for the disputed cases.
short_description: OrphAnalytics brings the solution of text authentication capable of detecting ghostwriting issues.

name: Sowoon Technologies
description:
Sowoon Technologies is a Swiss high technology company, focused on delivering customer value by state-of-the-art human behavior and activity monitoring solutions and technologies. Sowoon's next generation ultralight, non-intrusive devices are targeted for real-time driver alertness, shift-worker vigilance and consumer attention monitoring and alerting purposes.

Sowoon Technologies works in international markets, with worldwide clients and partners. Sowoon has multiple R&D projects running, with the European Space Agency (ESA), the European Commission (FP6) and the Swiss Agency for Innovation Promotion (CTI). With ESA, Sowoon is working on the next generation of fatigue and vigilance monitoring devices for on-ground and on-flight use. name: Nexilis
description:
Nexilis develops proprietary device products for fixation of implants in poor bone quality.

Their  Immediate Stabilisation System (ISS) is the application of an implantable polymeric tube around the original implant. Through the use of ultrasonic energy, the polymeric tube is moulded into the pores of the host bone, forming a strong and uniform bond with the adjacent bone. The original device is then implanted in the denser bony environment created, leading to enhanced immediate stability.

Extracellular Matrix (ECM) Coating allows coating of implants with a native extracellular matrix, leading to significantly improved long-term stabilisation of implants.
​Bisphosphonates block activity of osteoclasts, i.e. cells degrading bone. Their bisphosphonate coating allows coating of any implant surface, leading to significantly improved bone mineral density and enabling long-term stabilisation of implants.
short_description: Nexilis develops proprietary device products for fixation of implants in poor bone quality.

name: II-VI Laser Enterprise
description:
II-VI Laser Enterprise GmbH is an industry-leading manufacturer of high-power semiconductor laser components enabling fiber and direct diode laser systems for material processing, medical, consumer and printing applications. In addition, II-VI Laser Enterprise manufactures pump lasers for optical amplifiers for both terrestrial and submarine applications and vertical cavity surface emitting lasers (VCSELs) for optical navigation, optical interconnects and optical sensing applications.

II-VI Laser Enterprise GmbH is a globally operating and innovative company and an industry-leading provider of 980nm single mode laser pumps, High Power Laser Diode and VCSEL laser solutions. II-VI Laser Enterprise GmbH is a wholly-owned subsidiary of II-VI Incorporated (NASDAQ: IIVI, www.ii-vi.com) headquartered in Zürich, Switzerland. With state-of-the-art semiconductor laser design and production capabilities, processes and equipment the company manufacturers high-power laser components enabling fiber and direct diode laser systems for material processing, medical, consumer and printing applications. In addition, II-VI Laser Enterprise manufactures pump lasers for optical amplifiers for both terrestrial and submarine applications and vertical cavity surface emitting lasers (VCSELS) for optical navigation, optical interconnects and optical sensing applications.
short_description: II-VI Laser Enterprise GmbH is an industry-leading manufacturer of high-power semiconductor laser components

MÜLLER-GAUSS CONSULTING is a Swiss consulting company with offices in Pfäffikon near Zurich. 

MÜLLER-GAUSS CONSULTING has access  to around a dozen network partners and specializes in advising companies on risk and security issues.

MÜLLER-GAUSS CONSULTING provides independent and needs-based consulting services in the areas of security and risk management. Features of the services are a holistic approach ('risk management integration'), innovative problem solving and an explicit result orientation. 

MÜLLER-GAUSS CONSULTING works on a conceptual / strategic level as well as on an implementation basis; Consulting areas include safety and risk management concepts and issues in dealing with logistical / operational risks, planning and implementation of measures, event prevention and crisis management. 

MÜLLER-GAUSS CONSULTING is integrated into a strong network so that the know-how portfolio can be constantly optimized and kept up -to-date  , but also in order to fulfill the philosophy of the 'One Solution Provider'.

It is shaped through the ideas and vision of its designers and engineers who are united by a common goal and a common spirit: to build the excellence.

Marquise Technologies has been built on the assumption that something was missing in the post-production industry. Beyond the race to the highest speed or the largest resolution, they do not forget the man behind the machine: the artist that gives soul to a production, regardless of the size or purpose.

The mission of Marquise Technologies is to design solutions for people. Their products, and the human values they embody, blend power and innovation, versatility and feelings.

The family-owned company gets the best out of grain for demanding customers. The strict selection of cereals, modern facilities and miller's skill form the basis for flours with outstanding natural baking properties. Find out more on their website!

name: CH Precision
description:
CH Precision is a Swiss company dedicated to the design, manufacturing and commercialization of ultra high-end audio products under the 'CH' brand. Fully designed and manufactured in Switzerland, CH products stand out for their exceptional audio performances and build quality. Although the company is still fairly young, the team has a solid experience and a proven track record in designing high performance, high-end audio from its previous activities with ABC-PCB (high-end audio OEM) and ANAGRAM Technologies (audio DSP technologies) among others.

Whereas product design is fully done in-house, manufacturing is handled by local business partners. The enclosures are machined by specialized Swiss companies active in the luxury watch industry. Printed circuit boards and the units' final assembly are handled by ISO certified partners in the Swiss Alps area. Working hand in hand with highly skilled, dedicated people allows CH Precision to deliver a consistent perfect quality to all its products.

The team has an unrivaled experience in the high-end audio industry covering both digital & analog board design, DSP software, FPGA programming as well as mechanical design. This is confirmed by the specialized press recognition and the numerous awards received by all CH products. CH Precision also closely collaborates with Technology Institutes and Universities to keep up-to-date with the latest research and technological developments. The company strongly believes that correctly applied technology confirmed by in-depth measurements at the lab and finally a thorough listening is the way to improve the art of audio reproduction.

CH products provide a unique blend of ultimate audio performance, timeless design and build quality. Based on the latest technologies and open for future upgrades due to its modular approach, they make every audiophile's heart beat faster. Last but not least, the company takes enormous pride in correlating superb audio performance with excellent measured performance and reliability.
short_description: CH Precision is a Swiss company dedicated to the design, manufacturing and commercialization of ultra high-end audio products.

name: H.GLASS
description:
H.Glass, formerly g2e glass2energy SA, has since acquired the dye-sensitised solar cell (DSSC) licence for this new type of photovoltaic cell.  H.Glass is a preferred partner of companies specialising in solar technology, using ready-to-use modules laminated between two plates of glass – a piece of technology with a wide range of uses.

In 2017, g2e glass2energy SA became H.Glass – a name that is a better reflection of the Swiss company’s ambition, its quality, its values and its vision. The change was spurred by the firm’s repositioning on the global market.

Today, H.Glass employs more than 50 people in various fields. Its teams of researchers, chemists, and process and machine engineers help the firm to develop its products independently. H.Glass has also grown to encompass three production teams. Owing to its success, the Swiss company has ramped up production and is striving to expand the scale of manufacturing to better serve its customers’ needs.

H.Glass panels open up new channels to harness the energy potential of buildings. They are rewriting the rules on construction and can be used on façades (as building-integrated photovoltaics) and windows to generate electricity or simply because they look good!

H.Glass panels are a testament to the unprecedented design potential for architectural projects, with colours and designs covering the entire building.
short_description: H.Glass is active in engineering, manufacturing and sales of new type of transparent, coloured solar modules based on DSSC technology.

Geo-Energie Suisse AG's main objective is the development of pilot projects to demonstrate the technical feasibility of deep geothermal power plants and their long-term economic viability in the medium term. name: Foodarena.ch
description: Foodarena.ch is a food ordering platform where you can easily and reliably find a suitable delivery service for your current hunger. Currently Foodarena bundles more than 800 food couriers throughout Switzerland. You will find all imaginable kitchen categories and so no meal wish remains unfulfilled and every hunger is satisfied. With Foodarena, the days of menu cards on aged paper are finally a thing of the past. Here you can pizza and order other food conveniently online. You choose from a great variety a suitable delivery service for you and put your desired menu simply on the screen together. The order is then forwarded to the courier, who brings the food as usual to your door. The whole process is very easy: just enter your postal code into the large search field and you will see a clear list with countless food and pizza couriers in your area. It's best to try it out right away. For example, ordering pizza St. Gallen is very easy with Foodarena.ch.

name: Mt Pelerin
description:
At Mt Pelerin, we believe that an evolution of banking is long overdue. With the global enthusiasm for FinTech and the ever growing success of blockchain technologies, we now have all the right tools to make this evolution happen.

In a nutshell, we are building a fully regulated & compliant blockchain-based bank in Switzerland based on a modular platform offering all the services a bank can provide in a completely digitalized way, and therefore at a fraction of the cost.

We will be doing so while guaranteeing 100% of the deposits of our clients, at all time, and in a fully transparent manner.

Those deposits will be tokenized into crypto counterparts, on which smart contracts can be applied. With this approach, we will be able to provide to customers big and small a scope of banking services and a level of freedom in the choice of those services never seen before.

With us, the fruits of value creation will start flowing again toward their rightful owners: the customers and their assets.
short_description: Mt Pelerin is a Swiss blockchain banking project using full reserves, asset tokenization and smart contracts to build the future of banking.

name: Feralco
description:
Feralco (Schweiz) AG is a subsidiary of Feralco AB based in Helsingborg (Sweden).

Feralco (Schweiz) AG was founded in 2006 and has quickly established itself in Switzerland with the acquisition of CU Waterprocessing, the water technology division of CU Uetikon. In collaboration with the ETH and EAWAG, CU Waterprocessing developed phosphate precipitation with iron salts, a technique that has prevailed in over 90% of Swiss wastewater treatment plants.

Feralco (Schweiz) AG manages the complete product range of precipitants and flocculants, namely iron and aluminum salts, organic polymers and PACs of high and medium basicity, suitable for the treatment and purification of municipal and industrial wastewater, for drinking water treatment as well as in processes of Paper and Chemical Industry.

Feralco (Schweiz) AG stands for the consistent, technical approach in the service of its customers. Their qualified staff will gladly assist and advise you with proven competence. Know-how, experience and the mastery of even the most difficult circumstances are part of their range of services, if necessary also on site.
short_description: Feralco is a leading manufacturer of water treatment products and process chemicals .

name: Edelkrebs AG
description:
Edelkrebs AG specializes in keeping, fattening and propagating native crayfish in closed-loop systems. It was founded on 27.03.13 and is a spin-off of the ZHAW ( www.zhaw.ch ), which from 2011 to 2013 as part of a CTI project in cooperation with the Alex Gemperle AG ( www.gemperle.ch ) the basics developed to the noble cancer mast in circulatory systems.

The aim of the Edelkrebs AG is to translate the knowledge gained from the biological foundations into an ecologically sustainable circulatory system suitable for crayfish and grayling. 
By 2018, a productive plant with a production volume of one ton of crawdads and 10 tons of grayling is to be operated for food purposes. 
Already now the generated knowledge can be used for the propagation of native cancers as well as the European grayling for the conservation of species.
short_description: Edelkrebs AG specializes in keeping, fattening and propagating native crayfish in closed-loop systems.

Bacoba is a Swiss pharmaceutical start-up with a vision to develop innovative therapeutics derived from the unique chemicals nature supplies. In their multifaceted research they incorporate natural chemodiversity, traditional medicinal knowledge, molecular pharmacology, computer-aided drug design, and synthetic medicinal chemistry, to develop novel drugs for unmet medical needs in the field of infectious diseases.

name: Avicenna Oncology
description:
Avicenna Oncology is a start-up dedicated to the Discovery & Development of new generation of cytotoxic agents.

Avicenna is the most famous and influential of the philosopher-scientists of the medieval Islamic world. He was particularly noted for his contribution in the field of medicine. He composed the Al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb (The Canon of Medicine), which is among the most famous books in the history of medicine. Indeed, it became the preeminent source which had an influence over Europe’s great medical schools extended well into the early modern period. 

Avicenna Oncology aims at influencing the history of medicine at the same level with its vision .


"The knowledge of anything, since all things have causes, is not acquired or complete unless it is known by its causes." - Avicenna
short_description: Avicenna Oncology is a start-up dedicated to the Discovery & Development of new generation of cytotoxic agents.

name: AlveoliX
description:
AlveoliX provides in-vitro solutions based on proprietary and unique organ-on-chip technologies aimed at improving preclinical decision-making and thus reducing drug development costs.

AlveoliX aims at changing the way drug development research is done today by providing in-vitro models that reproduce the in-vivo environment in an unprecedented way. These in-vitro models, called organ-on-chips, will make it possible to better predict drugs’ responses in humans than standard in-vitro and in-vivo models and as a consequence to importantly reduce animal testing.
short_description: AlveoliX provides in-vitro solutions based on proprietary and unique organ-on-chip technologies.

name: Alpha-O Peptides
description: Alpha-O Peptides AG  (“AOP”) is a Swiss nano-biotechnology company focusing on the development of potent vaccines based on repetitive antigen display technology using their proprietary and patented self-assembling protein nanoparticles (SAPNs). AOP’s most advanced vaccine has demonstrated complete protection against malaria infection in an animal model. The National Institutes of Health (NIH) and the U.S. Military Infectious Disease Research Program have both supported this project. In addition, a grant from the US Department of Defense was awarded in 2014 to run a phase I/IIa clinical trial at the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research (WRAIR). In 2011, in collaboration with the University of Connecticut and the Kantonsspital St. Gallen, AOP received a 5-year NIH-NIDA award for the development of a nicotine vaccine from preclinical research into clinical trials phase I, which is currently also in GMP production. AOP has further initiated pre-clinical and basic research projects of several other programs targeting cancer and several other infectious diseases.​
short_description: Alpha-O Peptides are focusing on the development of potent vaccines based on repetitive antigen display technology.

name: iOnctura
description: iOnctura is a biopharmaceutical company focusing on novel therapeutics to modulate key culprits of immunosuppression in the tumor microenvironment. Immune checkpoint inhibitors (eg PD/PD-L1) have shown remarkable effectiveness for some but not for all cancer patients. iOnctura aims to improve current immune checkpoint therapies by developing novel drugs with potential best-in-class safety and efficacy profiles that when combined with checkpoint inhibition have the potential to optimize clinical outcomes. Through its partnerships with Merck and Cancer Research Technology (the commercial arm of Cancer Research UK, London, UK), iOnctura has established a pipeline of preclinical molecules to advance towards the clinic in combination with immuno-oncology assets from Merck. iOnctura is supported by a world renowned scientific advisory board and, with its access to CRT’s drug discovery labs and network of academic collaborators, is well-positioned to rapidly establish novel combination therapies in the field of cancer immunology. Headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland, iOnctura was founded by Merck Ventures in June 2017.

name: MeinEinkauf.ch
description:
Via MeinEinkauf.ch, private customers and companies domiciled in Switzerland (or Liechtenstein) can buy goods from online retailers in Germany and have them sent to their address in Switzerland.

As a customer of MeinEinkauf.ch you receive a @ MeinEinkauf.ch email address. If you use this e-mail address and buy and pay for the account of MeinEinkauf GmbH (Germany), your purchase will be completed duty paid and taxed by MeinEinkauf AG (Switzerland) directly to you in Switzerland. You pay no import duties or presentation fees.

For a delivery of any online retailer in Germany (eg amazon.de ) you pay - often even without shipping costs - the same final price as customers in Germany (in euros) and Meineinkauf.ch only a service fee from CHF 14.90 (see price list ), which includes the customs clearance and the dispatch to your address in Switzerland or Liechtenstein.
short_description: Via MeinEinkauf.ch, private customers and companies domiciled in Switzerland can buy goods from online retailers in Germany.

name: LORIOT

At LORIOT we envision a future where the IoT is accessible to everyone and transforms society and people’s lives for the better, improving not just processes and services but also the health of our planet and mankind.

Founded in Switzerland in 2015 by Vit Prajzler, the LoRaWAN Guru and former researcher at IBM, and Julian Studer with his over 10 years of experience in the Swiss banking & Finance industry.  LORIOT AG  today is a global IoT company, already present in more than 120 countries on 5 continents.
short_description:
A global secure, reliable, scalable LoRaWAN operator and service provider. Enabling LPWA IoT worldwide. 
The future of IoT is a Long Range!

Anchored on its territory, defending a strong project of creating a common European area of ​higher education, the FEDE has participatory status with the Council of Europe.
A non-profit organization, independent of the governmental authorities, it defends the interests of the citizens, carrying out a project of education and learning for all and influences the European decisions to guarantee the Human rights, the freedom of teaching and the dialogue between cultures.

With more than 50 years of existence, an extensive network of alumni and partner schools, the FEDE has devised innovative educational protocols and offers a degree program, professionalizing and appreciated by European actors. Thus, the FEDE now offers 75 degrees in 9 areas of expertise, recognized by professionals, recruiters and economic organizations, thought with them and for them.

To choose a FEDE diploma is to prepare oneself for the jobs of today and tomorrow, resolutely open to the world.

From marketing to sustainable development, from design to IT, from tourism to logistics, from trade to human resources, FEDE diplomas offer the assurance of quality training, innovative pedagogy and international perspectives.

name: Zurich Instruments
description:
Zurich Instruments is a test and measurement company based in Zurich, Switzerland, developing and selling measurement instruments and delivering customer support in key markets around the world, either directly or with carefully selected partners. They are a growing, independent and founder-led company.

Zurich Instruments makes cutting-edge instrumentation for scientists and technologists in advanced labs who are passionate about phenomena that are often notoriously difficult to measure. Their core offering includes lock-in amplifiers, phase-locked loops, arbitrary waveform generator, impedance analyzers, digitizers and boxcar averagers. 

They believe that system integration is good. They believe that system integration leads to significant time savings, reduced lab setup complexity, efficient workflows and reliable, accurate measurements.

Their instruments deliver market-leading specifications for sensitivity, dynamic range, feature set, speed and accuracy as a list of Zurich Instruments' industry firsts shows:d delivering customer support in key markets around the world, either directly or with carefully selected partners. They are a growing, independent and founder-led company.
short_description: Zurich Instruments is a test and measurement company based in Zurich.

name: Zestagen
description: Zestagen is a Swiss biotechnology company developing light chain mAbs against Extracellular Heat Shock Protein-90 (ehsp90). hsp90 is a validated pharmaceutical target. ehsp90 is implicated in cancer cell motility, migration and metastasis. It is detectable at the surface of several cancer cells but not of normal adult cells. Zestagen's mAbs bind ehsp90 at the surface of cancer cells (but not normal cells) leading to significant inhibition of metastasis in preclinical cancer animal models. Unlike small molecule hsp90 inhibitors which do not discriminate between the extracellular and intracellular hsp90 pool, Zestagen’s mAbs are predicted to display a superior therapeutic index in cancer patients.
short_description: Zestagen is a Swiss biotechnology company developing light chain mAbs against Extracellular Heat Shock Protein-90 (ehsp90).

name: Smartcanula
description: Smartcanula LLC is the leading manufacturer for advanced interfaces between the circulatory system and cardio-pulmonary bypass, the key technology for open heart surgery. As a matter of fact, remote cannulation with traditional cannula designs severely limits the blood flow and major pressure drops are common on both, the arterial and the venous side. The innovative smart cannulation principle, which is based on collapsed cannula insertion and expansion within the target vessels, allows for circumvention of such limitations, and full pump flow can usually be reached with gravity drainage alone. Hence, centrifugal pumps, vacuum or other artifices can be avoided. As a result the pump set-up for extracorporeal circulation can be simplified including all, hardware, software, and operator interventions.
short_description: Smartcanula LLC is the leading manufacturer for advanced interfaces between the circulatory system and cardio-pulmonary bypass.

Their unique nanolithography tools, called NanoFrazor, trace their origins to the Millipede project from IBM Research Zurich. The multiple-patented technology uses heatable silicon tips for patterning and simultaneous imaging of arbitrary high-resolution nanostructures. The NanoFrazor opens up new and unprecedented possibilities for nanofabrication in order to accelerate scientific and technological progress in all fields of nanotechnology. Since its foundation in 2012, SwissLitho has received many of the most prestigious national and international start-up and technology awards. They are a multi-national and interdisciplinary team of engineers and scientists from more than 10 countries and with customers from all over the world.
short_description: SwissLitho develops, produces and markets the NanoFrazor, a new and innovative tool for fabricating nanostructures.

TechPlants is composed of a group of people who acquired such knowledge from the demanding field of exclusive luxury watches, where in terms of precision and finishing quite similar requirements are applied as compared to medical devices.

With this know-how transfer, they are able to build on the advantage of highly efficient and cost-effective production.

name: SciTrackS
description:
SciTrackS stands for Scientific Tracking Solutions - customized video tracking solutions for high performance measurements in research and industry. Typically, their products are used in high performance measurement settings, such as to perform multi object real time tracking in 3D, as in the case of mosquito swarm tracking.

Their solutions are customized for your specific measurement application and they provide on and off site support to ensure a system's functionality. They are satisfied only after having provided the final customizations on site and the measurements are performed with optimal system performance. Their systems can be adapted if the experimental conditions are altered, and flexibly extended to include additional functionalities if the need arises, such as to control stimuli depending on a tracked animal's behaviour, etc.

SciTrackS is a Spin-Off of the Institute of Neuroinformatics at the University of Zurich and the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH) Zurich, Switherland. Their research experience and technological know-how allows us to offer high performance measurement solutions taylored to your specific research problem. For the past 10 years, they have provided numerous cutting-edge tracking solutions for a variety of research applications, from walking ants to flying bats. Optionally, They deliver the entire measurement setup, or setup components, including measurement setup, lighting, device controllers, software tools, etc.
short_description: SciTrackS stands for scientific tracking solutions.

name: Systemfive
description:
Systemfive® is headquartered in D4 Business Village, Root D4 (Canton Lucerne), Switzerland, with offices in the United States, United Arab Emirates and Japan. This broad support to several locations makes, among other things, a 7x24 support possible without major additional costs for the customer.
The company was founded in 2008 as a limited liability company, and was converted into a public limited company towards the end of 2010. Since June 2011, Systemfive® AG has been integrated into Systemfive® Holding.

Systemfive® achieved a milestone in terms of security in October 2012: obtaining ISO Certificate 27001 for Information Security Management System in entire companies. Since 2012, there has also been a partnership with the ICT service provider Green Datacenter AG, which operates one of the most highly certified data centers in Europe. Green Datacenter AG also holds the ISO 27001 certification, which means that Systemfive® services in the entire range of services are based on strict security and availability guidelines.

The market of Systemfive® is not limited to Switzerland: From the beginning, Systemfive® AG has also focused on international orders. The clientele includes medium-sized companies, large corporations operating worldwide and the Swiss Confederation.

Systemfive® specializes in developing reliable and highly available solutions for its customers. Projects are handled on time at all times, even under difficult conditions, and provide the customer with maximum satisfaction with their IT. By building the services and the very personal contact between the customer and Systemfive®, the optimal solution for the company can be quickly determined and implemented without the customer losing existing services. With us, the customer always gets a customized solution to the problem, tailored to the particular infrastructure. They think IT should adapt to the company, not the other way round.
short_description: Systemfive® specializes in developing reliable and highly available IT solutions for its customers.

These systems were borrowed from typewriters, desktop PCs and notepads and simply shrunk down to size – with the result that they prevent you from getting the most out of your mobile assistant because text input is so slow and fiddly.

SamanTree Technologies is a Swiss, biomedical instrumentation startup that develops and commercializes a new generation of imaging systems for in-vitro and in-vivo histology for medical and diagnostic devices.

Their vision is to bring the histopathology laboratory to the tip of the endoscope. Providing the endoscopist with a powerful microscope to see the cellular and micro-vascular structure of large tissue areas, in real time, enables to perform “live histology” and characterize suspicious lesions during the time of the endoscopic procedure.

As an EPFL Spin-off, SamanTree Technologies benefits from the exceptional innovation ecosystem around this leading Swiss research institution.

name: SmartGene
description:
SmartGene was founded in 1998 as a privately-held company to develop, market, and support application services for the analysis and management of complex genetic data.

SmartGene has its worldwide headquarters in Switzerland. SmartGene's North American operations opened in the Research Triangle Park area of North Carolina in 2006.

SmartGene’s proprietary technology, the Integrated Database Network System (IDNS) combines Web and database capabilities with advanced bioinformatics and relevant genetic content in application-specific suites.

Currently available modules from SmartGene include: identification of bacteria and fungi by sequence analysis; genotyping and drug resistance of HIV, HCV, and influenza; multilocus sequence typing (MLST) for epidemiology of viruses and bacteria; HLA typing, and certain genetically coded diseases. Since the platform and layout of all modules are similar, users can easily switch between applications with minimal additional training.

Over the years, SmartGene has gained a broad customer base for which it has constantly enhanced its services. Customers of SmartGene include diagnostic centers, clinical reference labs, academic medical centers, public health laboratories, S&P 500 companies, research centers, and national networks of sites collaborating in clinical genomics.

Beyond its use in the laboratory, the IDNS platform enables users from different organizations and in multiple locations to network and share data securely online.

SmartGene's commitment is to provide first-class service to a rapidly growing community of scientists involved in the analysis of complex genetic data. They strive to keep their customers in step with evolving science, to enhance the accuracy of genetic interpretation, and to make it easier to generate meaningful results.
short_description: SmartGene's aim is to develop, market, and support application services for the analysis and management of complex genetic data.

name: Smartcockpit
description:
smartcockpit is a cutting edge business management software that assists companies in managing their business decisions. smartcockpit believes that managers can and should make decisions in a more effective manner. They need to be able to focus on urgent, important and strategic matters impacting the company.

An excess of unstructured and unfocused information in all types and forms is cluttering their mind and making it impossible to delineate the critical information needed to make the right decisions. Decision makers need to be able to differentiate diverse types of information linked to the decision impact what they are focused on at that moment in time.

Whether the company is tracking Key Risks Indicators (KRI’s), Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s) or managing their scorecard, smartcockpit allows organizations to have a general overview of the company goals, unit specific overviews, and it assists collaboration between units. Company health is always Under control. Data from a variety of internal and external sources as well as different types (structured and unstructured) is channeled into one single, shared source of information. smartcockpit provides a true 360° view on risks, compliance, performance, quality and project progression.

smartcockpit provides information that is easy to understand, share and manage. Data-driven information that can spark efficiencies. It helps people see things that were not obvious to them before and ensures that something is done to manage the situation, that things are under control/managed.

In a distinctive, clear and innovative manner, smartcockpit provides a comprehensive platform allowing managers to encompass all information feeds focusing down on the decision required and then capturing and measuring the impact of all decisions made.

smartcockpit is a Swiss software company incorporated in 2013.
short_description: smartcockpit is a cutting edge business management software that assists companies in managing their business decisions.

name: NanoScan
description:
NanoScan commercializes nanotechnology by developing new products, solutions and application segments as well as by optimizing current methods. Its purpose is to provide the global market with high-resolution scanning probe microscopes fulfilling present and future analytical needs on nanometer-sized surface structures.

The formation of NanoScan began in 2003, when the initiators at the Institute of Physics at the University of Basel developed a prototype of their high-resolution Magnetic Force Microscope capable of enhancing the resolution by a factor of 10 compared to other available microscopes. The prototype instrument was sold to Seagate Technology, a well-known manufacturer of hard disc drives, in 2003 and operates to their full satisfaction.

As the winner of the Swiss Technology Award 2003, NanoScan (formerly SwissProbe) has proved its ability to venture into new dimensions of nanotechnology.

In 2009, NanoScan was acquired by the world-leader manufacturer of Time-of-Flight Secondary Ion Mass Spectrometers Ion-Tof. Since then, both companies strive to design high-end instruments for surface analysis that combine physical with chemical information at the nanoscale.
short_description: NanoScan commercializes nanotechnology by developing new products, solutions and application segments.

name: Ozics
description:
Ozics was founded by experts in orthopaedic surgery and biomaterial science to commercialise a family of surgical implants to first address the screw purchase problems currently experienced with osteosynthesis and shortcomings in the treatment of vertebral compression fractures (VCF ). Following a successful execution of a series of clinical trials, Ozics is determined to bring to the market a minimally invasive fracture fixation system to be used in load bearing fractures, such as hip, as a stand-alone device allowing immediate unassisted mobility.

Ozics’ vision is to develop a range of materials and implants that deliver the clinical benefits outlined above. The basic material is a composite of a dimethylacrylate based polymer matrix and ceramic filler, containing silicate glass and hydroxyapatite (HA). The material can be administered by injection to provide a custom-made, intra-bony implant. Used primarily as a stand-alone device, it can also be used in conjunction with other fixation approaches and devices. Ozics’ first product offering, CompO6™ reinforced bone composite, is an injectable bone cement indicated for vertebral compression fractures and to aid screw purchase in trauma procedures throughout the entire skeleton.
short_description: Ozics’ vision is to develop a range of materials and implants that deliver the clinical benefits outlined above.

 By looking at old habbits in a new light, they aim to drive and enable the transition to more sustainable ways of living and working. At Positive Energy, they belive that they can make the resources of the planet last millions of years, if they change the way they treat them. By making small changes in their lives, they can take better care of their resources – be it their own or that of the planet.

With more than 10-year experience in 3D animation research and development, the startup has created a unique technology in collaboration with the EPFL, called NumIK, that accurately gives life to any 3D characters (Virtual Humans, animals and more) in real-time. Based on NumIK, Moka Studio invented and released Mosketch Light, a 3D animation software that allows professionals and artists to animate any 3D characters by the stroke of a pen. The technology will further be applied to help VR and AR companies evolve and bring 3D characters and Virtual Humans to life. 
Moka Studio is on a mission to: 
- Copy the human movement and realistically bring our digital envelope to life 
- Give Virtual Humans full control over the digital world 
- Enable smooth and lifelike interactions of 3D characters in real-time

They and their partners belong to the leading research institutions in space life sciences and space biotechnology in Europe. They have the experience and the technology to design, construct and test microgravity experiment hardware for large and small jet aircraft and suborbital systems. This includes the development of appropriate mission and ground infrastructure concepts. They are dedicated to ensuring a maximum of scientific output. They also have the experience and expertise to plan, design and execute biotechnological and biomedical experiments at the cellular and molecular level in altered microgravity conditions.

Have your bioseparation at a sample recovery higher than ever. Their flat sheet membranes contain no wetting agents or other chemical contamination. This brings ease of use and sample purity to a new level also for you separation process. Join us for the future in high performance separation by choosing Novamem flat sheet membranes!

Novamem’s patented technology enables the fabrication of high resistance filters. These membranes can withstand practically all known organic solvents and allow operation at high pressures and temperatures.

name: PMOD Technologies
description:
The PMOD software has origins dating back to 1993, when PET was mainly a research tool. For lack of software, development of quantification tools was started at the University Hospital PET Center in Zurich. Soon, there was an interest in the PET community to adopt the programs. Therefore, in collaboration with engineers from Warsaw University of Technology, the software was brought into industrial-grade quality, and distributed to numerous leading PET sites in the world. Based on their feedback, scope and functionality were improved, resulting in a suite of tools covering the diverse needs of researchers in the field of molecular imaging.

Due to the wide adaptation of PMOD in the field, support of the project within the University became difficult. Therefore, PMOD Technologies LLC was founded in 2003 as a spin-off of the Zurich PET Center to further develop and distribute the PMOD software. Since then, the customer base has massively grown, now comprising more than 550 sites with over 1000 active users worldwide. In parallel, functionality has been markedly extended, reaching into the neighboring domains of functional MRI and CT. Vibrant collaborations with various flagship institutions ensure that their PMOD software remains leading-edge.

They aim to equip researchers with best-in-class software quantification tools for biomedical imaging in humans and animals, and to back them up in their experimental work by outstanding support and services.
short_description: PMOD Technologies has aim to equip researchers with best-in-class software quantification tools for biomedical imaging in humans & animals.

name: NewBehavior
description:
At NewBehavior AG they combine state-of-the-art science and unique engineering to solve current and upcoming challenges in behavioral brain research. They do not simply provide customers with hard- and software but also with thorough support encompassing wide scientific areas where their products can be applied.

The number of genetically modified mice created to investigate the neural basis of behavior is rapidly increasing, but most involved laboratories lack the resources to test sufficiently large numbers of mice in conventional behavioral tests.

Their automated in-cage testing offers not only the required high throughput and flexibility, but will also remain compatible with increasingly severe governmental regulations on animal experimentation. A particular challenge of toxicological research is to detect discrete and chronic behavioral changes. Long-term in-cage testing offers maximal sensitivity and efficiency in detecting such changes. With their comprehensive hard- and software packages they help their costumers to find the most perfectly adapted solution for their specific needs.
short_description: NewBehavior develops state-of-the art technology for automated measuring and shaping of animal behavior.

name: Piexon
description:
Founded in 2000 by partners Raphal Fleischhauer and Jürg Thomann, Piexon is today an SME with 15 employees in Aarwangen near Langenthal.

The company specializes in the production of pepper-fired self defense devices. The patented and unique system to "shoot" a highly effective solution in a single beam enables a completely new application perspective and forms the basis of all JPX and Guardian Angel products.

The assortment is constantly being developed and supplemented, whereby besides the quality, the efficiency of the instruments comes first. Thus, a JPX is in no way inferior to an electric shock shooting device, on the contrary has a more massive and long-lasting but controllable effect, with lower acquisition and deployment costs. The JPX devices are all assembled and tested by experts on their production line in Aarwangen. This guarantees an error rate in the range of close to zero.

If you have questions about their products or their company, please contact us at any time.

They do not have a shop, but they also advise you on appointment in person at their place.

Thanks to the extensive know-how and experience accumulated during these years, the core business has steadily changed in the development of complex technical software and system engineering and consulting.

The continuously increasing mandates in software development, system engineering and consulting led to the founding of further support and consulting companies worldwide in 2007 with new partners and a joint venture, among them Wizlynx AG (Switzerland), Wizable Inc. (USA), Wizable GmbH (Germany), Wizlynx PTE (Singapore), Beijing Wizlynx Technology (China) and Wizlynx (Mexico).

The main focus of PhotoDerma SA's activity lies on applications of photodynamic therapy (PDT) for cosmetic and therapeutic applications in dermatology. The company also carries out research mandates in various segments of PDT and photodiagnostics.

For the general public, they offer a free high-resolution weather forecast that is second to none.
meteoblue uses cutting edge science and technology to generate, display and distribute weather information. Adapting the world-class NMM weather prediction model to meso-scale, they are able to detect climatic patterns typical of mountainous areas, lake shores and on the sea, as well as reconstruct weather patterns occurring in any place of the world with high precision.

Philochem has discovered and development innovative methodologies in the following areas:

- design, construction and screening of DNA-encoded chemical libraries of unprecedented quality and size

- development of small molecule-drug conjugates for cancer therapy

- development of radiolabeled ligands for cancer imaging

- development and application of chemical proteomics methodologies for the discovery of pharmaceutical targets

These technologies are integrated into drug discovery and product development programs.

She focused on the development and production of CF / PEEK implants and instruments. The services were extended by structural analysis using the finite element method.

During its full-time involvement with the company Plusendoprothetik (now Smith & Nephew Orthopedics) by the company founder, the MedTech Composites was operated as a secondary occupation on the back burner.

However, in October 2008, the time was ripe to put all the experience gained over seven years in the field of orthopedics and traumatology into complete self-employment.

From the development department of Smith & Nephew Orthopedics AG, three more experienced employees could be won.

The employees of the company MedTech Composites have over three decades of experience in the development of sophisticated implants for orthopedics and traumatology. Whether modern femoral neck prostheses, sophisticated finger joints or innovative spinal implants - the developments are always one step ahead of the state of the art.

Every one of their employees has often stood at the operating table and understands the language and requirements of cutting-edge medicine as well as clinical everyday life.

Their shared motivation is the passion to find innovative solutions for the best possible care of patients through unconventional approaches.

Ionplus offers fully automated graphitization systems, gas interface systems, automated carbonate handling systems, pneumatic sample presses and vacuum lines for sealing tubes and a range of accessories for all products. Their goal for these products is a high degree of automation and versatility, as well as a compact and user-friendly design achieved through excellent engineering. NeoCoat offers CVD diamond coating services, neoDiam® Coatings, for customized diamond-coated pieces to be used in the tool, metrology, microsystems, mechanical or watch making industries. For markets such as jewelry, high-tech optical and electronic applications, NeoCoat grows single crystals of diamond, neoDiam® SC. NeoCoat also produces conductive diamond electrodes, neoCoat® Electrodes, for analytical, chemical synthesis and water treatment applications.

NeoCoat has developed a range of fully-automated deposition CVDiam® reactors covering all capacity requirements, with dedicated processes for substrate pretreatments and diamond deposition on various substrate materials.

name: iNoCs
description:
iNoCs is a start-up based in Lausanne, Switzerland. iNoCs is a provider of on-chip interconnection technology for the semiconductor market, based on award-winning research led at Stanford University, USA, University of Bologna, Italy and EPFL, Switzerland.

With the advent of multicore systems, the on-chip interconnect has become the pulsating heart of today's designs. It is in charge of delivering large amounts of commands and data among cores with minimum latency, of synchronizing the system operation, of guaranteeing reliable communication. Unfortunately, over the years, the amount of effort required to design the on-chip interconnect has been scaling together with the number of components to link.

iNoCs is a supplier of Network-on-Chip IP and tools to overcome the increasing challenges of interconnect design. Thanks to its portfolio of solutions, iNoCs can provide a smooth, plug&play flow from application requirements to physical implementation. iNoCs technology saves power, improves performance, and keeps area at a minimum, while reducing design time and ensuring timing closure.

iNoCs is currently part of the NaNoC Project, a trans-European research effort on NoC design technologies supported by the European Union.
short_description: iNoCs is a provider of on-chip interconnection technology for the semiconductor market.

Infrasurvey also obtain the support of Finergence, a foundation for innovative companies.

Infrasurvey proposes an innovative solution to monitor landslides and other ground movements using GNSS (GPS and Glonass satellite constellations) to obtain a centimetric accuracy (subcentimetric standard deviation). It uses a network of GPS modules connected by radio and alimented by solar panels. The installation is fast, easy and “plug and play”.
