description: Quap stands for Quick Appointment and is the fastest and most convenient way to book your appointments online - for free, anytime, anywhere. Whether hairdresser, massage or tennis court: Quap offers you an online booking platform where you can directly book all the services you need. Quap GmbH is an independent Swiss company. They have made it their goal to make online appointment bookings for various services in Switzerland. Bookings for a wide variety of appointments should be made at any time, anywhere and conveniently online. Therefore, since the end of 2013, eight employees have dedicated themselves to connecting customers and service providers via the Quap platform.
short_description: Quap is an online booking platform allowing users to find appointments with local businesses conveniently.

name: Straumann USA
description: Straumann conducts research, develops and manufactures dental implants, instruments, prosthetics, as well as dental biomaterials for use in tooth replacement and restoration, or to prevent tooth loss. As technological advancements are changing dentistry fundamentally, Straumann offers a broad range of products and solutions for both conventional treatment and digital workflows including guided surgery, intra-oral scanning and CAD/CAM restorations.
short_description: Straumann USA manufactures and markets dental implants.

name: Histide
description:
Histide is a biotech intellectual property platform company pioneering a new class of non-mutagenic extracellular therapeutic agents called Cell Recoding Molecules™ (CRMs). This innovative platform builds on Histide’s expertise in the mechanisms underlying the cell’s microenvironmental sensing and signal transduction processes. The CRMs promote and stimulate the cell’s natural capacities to redirect its own fate by integrating accurate extracellular signals. This is at the heart of Histide’s groundbreaking approach of addressing diseases called Recoding Therapeutics™, that goes beyond traditional cell, gene or RNA based therapies. Histide has a technological breakthrough with vast indication spectra of pharmaceuticals, medical devices and medical cosmetics.

Their mission : Establish Cell Recoding Molecules (CRMs) as new class of therapeutic solutions.

Their vision : To unlock the potential of Recoding Therapeutics by establishing an ecosystem of teams and partners, all committed to providing enhanced therapeutic solutions across diverse areas and routes of administration, for diseases that are untreatable or undruggable today.
short_description: Histide is a biotech intellectual property platform.

name: CLS Communication
description:
CLS Communication is among the largest professional translation and language services providers in Europe. With local offices across the continent, including Switzerland, Germany and the UK, they are in touch with the pulse in Europe. CLS is also part of Lionbridge, the largest language provider in the world, giving us a global presence second to none. This global presence, together with their local relevance, mean CLS is the right partner for you, whatever your language needs.

Their core business is translating, writing/copywriting and editing/proofreading for the banking and finance, life science, insurance, consulting and public sectors. This includes translating and editing annual and quarterly financial reports and website content, as well as writing fund performance commentaries and media and marketing documents.
short_description: CLS Communication is among the largest professional translation and language services providers in Europe.

name: Kaddz
description: KADDZ accompanies your cat in all their adventures - you can see where your Tiger just is and can help if required . KADDZ notifies you when your cat leaves the usual area or stays a long time in a dark place . In search mode, the collar transmits the position of the cat every 30 seconds to your phone. You can quickly get back home so your favorite .
short_description: KADDZ – the intelligent cat collar was created out of our love for house cats.

name: Cloudlynx
description:
Cloudlynx is a highly compliant Swiss cloud provider offering IaaS especially to regulated industries (pharma, banking and government). Benefits include single legal jurisdiction, strong security, real rapid elasticity and GxP compliance. 

The transition to IT services based on cloud computing includes more risk for life science, banking, government and other regulated industries than for any other industries. This is due to the strict regulatory requirements specific to these particular sectors. Cloudlynx offers a cloud solution that takes these specifics into account and includes the industry’s needs from the early design phase to the cloud’s implementation. 

Our cloud engineers and professionals have many years of experience in high performance computing, network engineering, IT and network architecture, IT security and governance, risk and compliance. They have worked with customers in both Europe and North America in industries as diverse as defence, banking and pharma. 

A member of the Datalynx Group, Cloudlynx was founded in Basel, Switzerland, in 2014 . The company’s goal is to become the leading cloud provider in Europe and to be among the top ten global players
short_description: Cloudlynx offers IaaS solutions especially to regulated industries such as pharma, banking, and government.

Klimpr is the first step in that direction. With Klimpr you can pay your friends directly from your iPhone or Android phone and use your phone to pay in shops.

name: PumpTire
description: PumpTire is commercializing the first self-pressurizing bicycle inner tubes. Imagine taking your bicycle out of the garage and never having to fill up the tires or even check the pressure. Or imagine yourself being able to change your tire pressure on-the-fly with a simple adjustment from the handlebars. PumpTire is developing both of these systems. The self-inflating, self-adjusting technology is incorporated directly into the tire and is compatible with current rims, making it a simple addition to any bicycle.

description: sharoo is the independent platform for private (P2P) car sharing and car owners united with people who want to rent a vehicle. Nowadays vehicles are on average 23 daily 24 hours around unused. This makes neither economic nor environmental sense. sharoo offers car owners an online platform which allows a more efficient use of this untapped potential. The intelligent, direct networking of owners and users, optimized sharoo the utilization of existing vehicles. sharoo allows individuals and organizations to protect their vehicles easily and quickly with each other to share and manage via the online platform. In addition to the clear and flexible web-platform sharing process is also facilitated with the aid of innovative hardware and software.

name: LASCCO
description:
Lascco focuses on biomedical technologies developed by scientists devoted to their academic activities and remote from the entrepreneurial world. Recent years have witnessed the emergence of a number of public and private organizations providing seed capital, management support, and sometimes infrastructure, for the launching of start-up biotech companies. These financial and business supports are primarily directed at scientists willing or ready to embark on an entrepreneurial venture. Innovative technologies developed by scientists devoted to their academic activities and uninterested in an entrepreneurial venture remain unexploited and their value is kept buried.

They aim at filling the gap between academic research and the pharmaceutical industry, by structuring and managing the progression of selected discovery-stage biomedical technologies from the academic lab all the way to the proof of concept in humans. Their constant goal is to broaden their connections with the pharmaceutical industry and to remain well informed of the unmet market needs on the one hand, and to consolidate their relationship with researchers and physicians on the other hand.
short_description: LASCCO SA is a biomedical-technology development private company based in Geneva.

IF Games is Switzerland’s first game agency. We make games on a foundation of fun, with a purpose beyond entertainment. We activate, educate and engage.

Games can offer richer experiences that last longer than print, radio or television.

By putting a game strategy at the heart of your brand we can communicate messages and values in more exciting ways than ever!
short_description: IF Games is Switzerland’s first game agency.

DAC System continuously improves and enhances functions and features of their products. They supply their products and total system solutions world wide to broadcast and network operators. Their self developed products are manufactured in Switzerland acc. to the highest quality standards.

Their development engineers are able to customize products and solutions for their customers in a very short time.

DAC System is incorporated in Lugano.
short_description: DAC System is a high quality supplier of monitoring systems.

name: milKit
description:
milKit makes riding tubeless clean, safe and fun. With the Swiss invention, riders can quickly measure and check their remaining tire sealant with a simple, portable kit, adding sealant as needed while leaving their tires on the rim, maintaining air pressure, keeping their hands clean and saving time.

Product development engineer Pius Kobler and entrepreneur Sven Rizzotti are the founders of Sport Components Ltd. and creators of milKit. Both passionate mountain bikers, they develop solutions to everyday problems that they face in the biking world.
short_description: milKit is a Switzerland-based company that produce devices to measure and refill sealant in tubeless tires.

name: Sens07
description: sens07 is a microprocessor-controlled inflator modul applicable to a large variety of life jackets. Inflation time is based on a patented risk calculation algorithm considering static limit settings as well as dynamic behaviour in water. This allows to distinguish normal water contact  from perilous drowning risk.
short_description: Sens07 is an entrepreneurial engineering company near Zurich in Switzerland.

name: True Wealth

name: TwingTec
description:
TwingTec is developing the next generation of mobile wind energy system, being able to harvest the strongest winds at higher altitudes in remote places to produce clean energy cheaper than fossil fuels.

TwingTec develops an incredible energy harvesting kite that collects wind power while sailing the skies. Resembling the vintage box kite made famous by the Wright Brothers, the kite is connected to a ground station, which collects the wind energy through tension reels.
short_description: TwingTec´s mission is to commercialize a new windpower technology.

name: Right Shoes
description:
The Right Shoes system compares the three-dimensional volume of your feet with all the shoe sizes on the market and tells you the Right size for you!

Right Shoes is a service entirely web-based and accessible in every corner of the world. Our servers are located in AMAZON CLOUD FARM in order to allow functionality and speed everywhere.
All services and functions for each type of user:

 - Users
 - Manufactures
 - Brand
 - Retailer
short_description: Right Shoes is a new revolutionary service that guides the consumer in choosing the most appropriate shoe size.

name: Xpreneurs
short_description: Helps people to discover their talents and strengths and to make company to potential development platforms!

name: TimeRepublik
description:
TimeRepublik a peer-to-peer web platform where people from over 110 countries use time as currency (TimeCoins™) instead of money. Users use TimeCoins to pay for the services they need building trustworthy relations.

Members earn TimeCoins  by sharing their expertise, skills, talent, and passions with other members. TimeCoins earned by members are automatically credited into their virtual TimeWallet and can be used to purchase services from other members. All services are measured by the time it takes to perform them. User's visibility and recognition are gamified and are boosted by positive feedback and awards obtained once predetermined goals are achieved.
short_description: TimeRepublik is a global time banking platform that enables its users to save and spend time instead of money.

name: Swatch
description:
Swatch is a Swiss fashion brand that creates designer jewelries and watches for its worldwide users. The first Swatch watch appeared on the Swiss market in 1983, surprising everyone with its design and enormous success. It retains the renowned Swiss watchmaker’s signature use of design, fashionable colors, and rugged and sporty materials.


Swatch has also established a sturdy presence in the world of sports with its ongoing support for extreme sports such as FMX, Surf, Snowboarding, Free Skiing, BMX, and also for beach volleyball. The brand has pushed the limits of technology, introducing a range of materials from plastic, stainless steel, and aluminum to synthetic fabrics, rubber, and silicone. The company continues to find new ways to impart texture and color to an expanding range of shapes, and inventive designers take advantage of everything technology offers.


Swatch’s radical reduction in the number of parts known as “Revolution 51” enabled innovative assembly methods, and a variety of special packaging technologies makes it possible to deliver the products in captivating containers. Continuing advances in design, materials, and production technologies have enabled the brand to make even mechanical watches accessible to a much broader range of customers. 


Swatch was founded in 1983 by Nicolas G. Hayek and is headquartered in Bern.
short_description: Swatch is a Swiss fashion brand that creates designer jewelries and watches for its worldwide users.

name: TechNotie improvements limited
description:
TechNotie group is founded by a group of geeks who they're interested in technology.
TechNotie helps startups and and tech groups to do way better.
TeNotie works for free and just takes money by advertising on projects.
short_description: Startup improvements and consulting group

name: NetGuardians
description: NetGuardians is a leading software company recognized for its innovative solutions to keep operational risk under control. Using smart behavioral analysis methods, they have designed technology that quickly identifies atypical activity, effectively controls data leaks, and alerts you to potential internal fraud. Bundled for the banking sector, their solution can also be easily configured for any field of activity.
short_description: NetGuardians is a leading FinTech company recognized for its anti-fraud and risk mitigation solutions.

name: Prodibi
description:
Prodibi is a unique professional image platform that solves all issues of displaying online images to increase brand ROI, improve user engagement, and simplify the work of developers. 

Problems are numerous (quality, performance, color management, pixels density, responsiveness, SEO, etc.) and expensive to solve. For instance, the cropping of pictures can easily take a full week to a graphic designer. Their solution addresses all these issues in 1 click and provides viewers with an unprecedented visual experience of quality, in line with the prestige of your brand. 

They can easily replace any online image without having to redesign a website or take new photos.

Prodibi was launched in 2011 and is operated from Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: Prodibi is an online platform for showcasing high resolution images without a size limit.

name: Innovaud
description: Innovation advances good jobs and long-term prosperity.  Promoting innovative firms enhances the economic vitality of towns, cities, regions and entire countries. With these central principles in focus, the Canton of Vaud recently took an important step forward.  Along with regional partners in the business and scientific communities, the canton launched Innovaud in 2013, a private/public platform to support innovation in Vaud.  As a non-profit association, Innovaud has the vital mission of helping leaders of innovation projects to realize their potential.  Its means for achieving this are the expertise of its innovation consultants and an extensive network of innovators to which Innovaud provides access.
short_description: Innovation is a venture capital firm that promotes innovative firms that enhances the economic vitality of the Canton of Vaud.

name: Crossing tech
description:
Crossing-Tech is a Swiss-based integration and software company that offers its clients with various professional and product-related services. The company is popularly known for its product Connectivity Factory, an intermediation platform that offers smart connectivity services and ensures data is distributed across multiple systems and is available when and where it is needed. The solution comes with integration, enterprise connectivity, big data management, monitoring, process industrialization, and mergers and acquisitions features; and is used by several industries, including finance, insurance, healthcare, public administration, media, and transportation and logistics.

Crossing-Tech’s professional services include providing functional and technical analysis; defining high-level solution architectures; performing integrations, including back-to-front office, ERP, and CRM; creating APIs; ensuring state of the art data interoperability among targeted workstations; supervising flows implementation.
short_description: Crossing-Tech, a Swiss-based integration and software company, offers its clients with various professional and product-related services.

name: Playfulvision
description:
Playfulvision is a Swiss company that provides automatic real-time, video analytics and statistics for team-sports at all levels. The company’s founding team has over a decade of research experience. Its ongoing collaboration fulfills its mission to provide customers with new innovations in fully automated people-tracking.

Playfulvision is a spin-off of the Computer Vision Lab at Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Lausanne, Switzerland. It was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Ecublens.
short_description: Playfulvision is a Swiss company that provides automatic real-time, video analytics and statistics for team-sports at all levels.

name: Encuentra24.com
description: Encuentra24.com is an online classifieds platform catering property, vehicle, jobs, and electronics for sale by owners and agents from Panama, Costa Rica, Nicaragua and Central American marketplace.
short_description: Encuentra24.com is the leading horizontal classifieds marketplace in Centralamerica since 2005.

name: Xeit
description:
Xeit is an online platform and agency that provides services related to online marketing and social media. Its scope of services and products include tools such as online marketing, social media marketing, and websites.

The agency provides services ranging from consultation to creation and implementation.

Xeit was founded in 2009 and is based in Zürich, Switzerland.
short_description: Xeit is an online platform and agency that provides services related to online marketing and social media.

name: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees
description:
United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees leads and coordinates international actions to protect refugees and resolve refugee problems worldwide.


The organization’s primary purpose is to safeguard the rights and well-being of refugees. It strives to ensure that everyone can exercise the right to seek asylum and find safe refuge in another State with the option to return home voluntarily, integrate locally, or resettle in a third country. It also has a mandate to help stateless people.


In more than six decades, the agency has helped tens of millions of people restart their lives. Today, a staff of more than 8,600 people in more than 125 countries continues to help over 33.9 million people.


United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees was established on December 14, 1950 by the United Nations General Assembly. It is based in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees coordinates international actions to protect refugees and resolve refugee problems worldwide.

name: Tech Tour
description:
Tech Tour is an online platform for that is engaged in the development of emerging technology companies from Europe. It connects investors, tech entrepreneurs, corporates, and government influencers to work together towards its area of focus.


Its contribution to the high tech industry is through the development of regional tech tours and industry summits that bring together the entire technology ecosystem of local and global technology companies. It also rewards entrepreneurship in Europe through their annual ‘Entrepreneur of the Year’ and ‘Innovation’ awards.


The Tech Tour was founded by Venture Capitalist Sven Lingjaerde in 1998. It is based in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: Tech Tour is an online platform for that is engaged in the development of emerging technology companies from Europe.

name: Odience
description:
The Odience platform allows you to broadcast live video footage, straight from your desktop computer or mobile device, onto your ODIENCE channel/profile.

See something cool and want to share it? Simply take out your Smartphone, open up the app and start broadcasting!
short_description: Odience is the only social media platform that allows users to share and view authentic content!

name: Robohub
description:
Robohub is a non-profit online communication platform that brings together experts in robotics research, start-ups, business, and education from around the world. It is focused on connecting the robotics community with the general public.


Robohub was founded in 2012 and is based in Morges, Switzerland.
short_description: Robohub brings together experts in robotics research, start-ups, business, and education from around the world.

name: Abionic
description:
Abionic SA is ideally positioned at the boundaries of medical technology, biotechnology and nanotechnology. As a spin-off from EPFL (Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne, Switzerland), Abionic uses these highly advanced technologies to provide the medical profession with a novel diagnostic tool designed to give patients personal allergy profiles. Abionic aims to become an important international player in the field of personalized medicine, in particular in allergy detection.

Abionic SA is a certified ISO 9001/13485 company, including research, development and commercialization of in vitro diagnostic devices for allergies detection. The standard ISO 13485 specifies requirements for a quality management system where an organization has to demonstrate its ability to provide medical devices and related services that consistently meet customer and regulatory requirements.

Abionic SA is a privately owned high-tech company and is strongly supported by the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology of Lausanne (EPFL), The Canton of Vaud and Venturelab.

Abionic was founded by former scientists from the biomedical optics laboratory (LOB) at EPFL. Its headquarters are located in Lausanne, Switzerland.

Abionic appreciates the support it has received from:
short_description: Abionic SA is ideally positioned at the boundaries of medical technology, biotechnology and nanotechnology.

name: KMU Business World
description:
KMU Business World is an interactive online platform offering specialist articles, news and entertaining contributions, and online training sessions for its users. It provides its users with a range of functions that support their daily work. It also offers information related to working with web-based applications, while allowing its users to create online business cards for their companies. Its users have the ability test web-based applications and use them in their daily work using this platform.

KMU Business World was launched in 2012 and is based in Zürich. It is owned by Swisscom.
short_description: KMU Business World is an interactive online platform offering specialist articles, news and entertaining contributions, and more.

name: Vivos Dental
description:
Vivos Dental is a privately owned Swiss company specialized in the development, manufacturing, and marketing of oral bone augmentation solutions. Together with clinical research groups at the dental faculty of University of Geneva, Switzerland, the Academisch Centrum Tandheelkunde Amsterdam, Netherlands, and a network of dental professionals, it created the first 3D-printed bone substitute for use in oral bone augmentation.

Vivos Dental was founded in 2012 and is based in Villaz-saint-pierre.
short_description: Vivos Dental is a Swiss company specialized in the development, manufacturing, and marketing of oral bone augmentation solutions.

name: Bumotec
description:
Bumotec is a Swiss manufacturer of milling machines, turning machines, mill turns, multi spindle milling machines, and 5 axis milling machines. It is specialized in machinery serving the watchmakers. All its manufacturing steps, such as machining, housing, electrical, and assembly are performed in-house.

Bumotec was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Fribourg.
short_description: Bumotec is a Swiss manufacturer of milling machines, turning machines, mill turns, multi spindle milling machines, and more.

name: Contrinex
description:
Contrinex is a Swiss company that manufactures inductive and photoelectric sensors. It is focused on the development and sale of sensing equipment for industrial applications.

The company offers inductive, photoelectric, ultrasonic, and capacitive sensors as well as provides RFID and safety systems. It provides connectivity products such as cable-distribution systems and connectors as well as offers accessories, including sensor mounting clamps and sensor testers.

Contrinex offers its products for mechanical and chemical, permanent pressure, operating temperature, food industry, and sea-water applications. It distributes its products in Africa, Asia, Australasia, Europe, North America, and South America.

Contrinex was founded in January 1972 and is based in Givisiez, Switzerland.
short_description: Contrinex is a Swiss company that manufactures inductive and photoelectric sensors.

name: Geberit AG
description:
The Geberit Group is the European market leader in sanitary technology with a global orientation. Geberit has its own representatives in 41 countries. The range includes the product areas of sanitary systems and piping systems. Geberit brand products are innovative, durable and eco-efficient.

The Geberit Group generated a sales volume of CHF 2.3 billion in 2013 and employs 6,200 people.
short_description: The Geberit Group is the European market leader in sanitary technology with a global orientation.

name: InnoBE
description: InnoBE is a business consultancy firm based in Bern, Switzerland.
short_description: InnoBE is a business consultancy firm based in Bern, Switzerland.

name: SwissParks.ch
description:
SwissParks.ch is a national association that fosters technology parks and business incubators in Switzerland. It promotes exchanges of experience and joint initiatives among its members.

The association acts as a counterpart of foreign organizations such as IASP, NBIA, ADT, and Retis.

SwissParks.ch is based in Bern, Switzerland.
short_description: SwissParks.ch is a national association that fosters technology parks and business incubators in Switzerland.

name: Onsite Lab
description:
Switzerland based Onsite Lab Holding AG is the majority shareholder of MedMira, the leading developer and manufacturer of rapid flow-through diagnostics and technologies. Providing today`s medical progress to customers from all over the world while combining the highest standard in quality with economical sustainability.

The key benefits of MedMira`s technology:
Most advanced rapid diagnostics applying its own patented Rapid Flow-through Technology
FDA, CE, Health Canada and SFDA (China) approved
Results within 3 minutes, decreasing costs and enabling easy mass testing while securing the highest standard in quality
MedMira's products are easy to use and can be applied at the Point-of-Care (Doctor-Patient), laboratories and hospitals
Multiple results in one test – combining e.g. HIV with Hepatitis C and B
MedMira's facilities are ISO, FDA, CE, Health Canada and SFDA (China) approved
short_description: Onsite Lab provides best-in-class point of care diagnostics for unmet medical needs.

name: Y-Parc SA
description:
Y-PARC – Swiss Technopole offers many opportunities for carrying out research & development as well as industrial production.

Nearly 120 companies with about 1,100 employees have already been convinced by Y-PARC.  From start-ups through SMEs to multinationals, all have discovered an environment as well as solutions tailored to their needs.

The diversity of their skills and activities — especially in information and communication technology, precision engineering, and medical technologies — offers a rich potential for synergies and innovation.
short_description: Y-PARC – Swiss Technopole offers many opportunities for carrying out research & development as well as industrial production.

name: United Nations Human Rights
description:
The United Nations Human Rights Commission is responsible for the protection of all human rights and represents the world's commitment to universal ideals of human dignity. It offers leadership, works objectively, and is engaged in educating and taking action to empower individuals and assist States in upholding human rights.


Its thematic priorities are strengthening international human rights mechanisms; enhancing equality and countering discrimination; combating impunity and strengthening accountability and the rule of law; integrating human rights in development and in the economic sphere; widening the democratic space; and early warning and protection of human rights in situations of conflict, violence, and insecurity.


It also supports the work of the United Nations human rights mechanisms such as the Human Rights Council and the core treaty bodies set up for monitoring state parties' compliance with international human rights treaties. In addition, it promotes the right to development, coordinates United Nations human rights education and public information activities, and strengthens human rights across the United Nations system.


The United Nations Human Rights Commission consists of four major divisions: the Research and Right to Development division, the Human Rights Council and Special Procedures division, the Human Rights Treaties division, and the Field Operations and Technical Cooperation division.


As of December 31, 2013, the commission consists of 1085 employees in Geneva, New York, and in 13 country offices and 13 regional offices or centres around the world. It also consists of a workforce of 689 international human rights officers serving in UN peace missions or political offices. It is funded from the United Nations regular budget and from voluntary contributions from member states, intergovernmental organizations, foundations, and individuals.



The United Nations Human Rights Commission was established in 1945 and is headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: United Nations Human Rights provides substantive, secretariat, and research support to UN human rights mechanisms.

name: Patrón Spirits International
description: Patrón Spirits International is a manufacturer of ultra-premium distilled spirits. Its portfolio includes the following product lines: Patrón®, Roca Patrón®, Gran Patrón®, XO Cafe®, Citrónge®, Pyrat®, and Ultimat®, as well as limited and special edition distilled spirits. Patrón tequilas and liqueurs, Pyrat, and Ultimat are available in more than 100 countries and islands across the world and sold in global duty-free outlets
short_description: Patrón Spirits International is a manufacturer of ultra-premium distilled spirits.

name: Kaywa
description:
Kaywa is a developer of mobile applications and code management solutions. Its key products include the Kaywa Reader application and an API and QR Code management solution.

Additional products and developments of Kaywa includes DokoDare, a social, location-based service; Kaywa Ticket, a mobile ticket and ticket-scanning solution; Scanvenger, and more.

Kaywa was founded in 2005 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland. It operates additional offices in Belgrade, Serbia, and San Francisco in the United States.
short_description: Kaywa is a developer of mobile applications and code management solutions.

name: Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change
description:
Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) reviews and assesses the most recent scientific, technical, and socio-economic information that is relevant to the understanding of climate change. However, it does not conduct any research nor does it monitor climate related data or parameters.


Being an intergovernmental body, it is open to all member countries of the United Nations and WMO. Currently 195 countries are members of the IPCC. Governments participate in the review process and the plenary Sessions, where main decisions about the IPCC work program are taken and reports are accepted, adopted, and approved. The IPCC bureau members are also elected during these plenary sessions. Due to its scientific and intergovernmental nature, the IPCC embodies an opportunity to provide rigorous and balanced scientific information to decision makers. By endorsing the IPCC reports, governments acknowledge the authority of their scientific content. 


Thousands of scientists from all over the world contribute to the work of the IPCC on a voluntary basis. Review is an essential part of the IPCC process, to ensure an objective and complete assessment of current information so the organization aims to reflect a range of views and expertise. It is supported by WMO and UNEP, and hosted at WMO headquarters in Geneva.


Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change was founded by the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) and the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) in 1988 to provide the world with a clear scientific view on the current state of knowledge in climate change and its potential environmental and socio-economic impact in 1988 and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) is the leading international body for the assessment of climate change.

name: Internet Governance Forum
description:
Internet Governance Forum is a meeting of the new forum for multi-stakeholder policy dialogue.


Its site provides an interactive, collaborative space where all stakeholders can air their views and exchange ideas. The mandate of the internet forum is to discuss public policy issues related to key elements of internet governance in order to foster the sustainability, robustness, security, stability and development of the internet; facilitate discourse between bodies dealing with different cross-cutting international public policies regarding the internet and discuss issues that do not fall within the scope of any existing body; interface with appropriate inter-governmental organizations and other institutions on matters under their purview; facilitate the exchange of information and best practices, and in this regard make full use of the expertise of the academic, scientific and technical communities; advise all stakeholders in proposing ways and means to accelerate the availability and affordability of the internet in the developing world; strengthen and enhance the engagement of stakeholders in existing and future internet governance mechanisms, particularly those from developing countries; identify emerging issues, bring them to the attention of the relevant bodies and the general public, and where appropriate, make recommendations; contribute to capacity building for internet governance in developing countries, drawing fully on local sources of knowledge and expertise; promote and assess the embodiment of WSIS principles in internet governance processes; discuss issues relating to critical internet resources; help to find solutions to the issues arising from the use and misuse of the internet; and publish its proceedings.


Internet Governance Forum is headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: Internet Governance Forum is a meeting of the new forum for multi-stakeholder policy dialogue.

name: Boldomatic
description:
Boldomatic is the text-only social network connecting a global community of creative writers. Their free app for iOS, Android and Desktop allows writers to express their thoughts in bold, colorful text-images that can be shared within and outside the boldomatic network to Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr etc. Described as the "Instagram for words" by many, Boldomatic has been featured by TechCrunch and got nominated for the Swiss App Awards.

The Boldomatic Shop features over 9m unique products to chose from featuring your favorite bold statement on print, apparel and accessory. 

Boldomatic is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.
short_description: Boldomatic is the #1 network for quotes, sayings and everything text.

name: 5asec
description:
5asec is a textile care brand that provides its customers with dry cleaning and laundry services.

5asec provides its services in 3 segments, including basic services: dry cleaning, professional washing and steam ironing, and stain cleaning; professional services: duvet and home linen treatment, alterations services; and carpets, furniture, and leather cleaning; and textile care solutions: maxima treatment, appret finish, anti-moth and dust mites’ repellent solutions, and water repellent treatments.

5asec is headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: 5asec is a textile care brand that provides its customers with dry cleaning and laundry services.

name: FinanzNachrichten.de
description: FinanzNachrichten.de is a German online platform that provides news and information in the fields of market, economy, shares, stock, bonds, funds, currency, and more.
short_description: Current press releases of several news wire services.

name: Medimaps Group
description:
Medimaps Group's mission is to design and provide medical tools to assist in the collection of quantitative information on bone microarchitecture for use in routine clinical practice.

They enhance osteoporosis diagnosis by assessing the status of bone microarchitecture. They provide information to physicians to help them select the best treatment options for their patients and monitor treatment outcomes. They are working on future products to assess bone microarchitecture for application in the dental and orthopedic fields.
short_description: Medimaps Group is an innovative Swiss based company that is developing seamless solutions for clinical routine.

name: Blacksocks
description:
Blacksocks is a sock subscription service and online retailer that offers a variety of socks such as calf socks, knee socks, and silk cashmere socks. It delivers socks to more than 60,000 satisfied customers in 75 countries.


Blacksocks was launched on June 1, 1999 in Zurich, Switzerland.
short_description: Blacksocks is a sock subscription service and online retailer that offers a variety of socks worldwide.

name: Breguet
description: Montres Breguet S.A. designs and manufactures watches and jewelry. The company provides clocks, cufflinks, and writing instruments. It markets and sells its products through its outlets, as well as retailers and distributors in Switzerland and internationally.
short_description: Swiss manufacturer of luxury watches

name: Blancpain
description:
Blancpain S.A. manufactures and markets watches and timepieces for men and women. It also provides various services, such as opening of the case; disassembling the case, dial, hands, and movement; cleaning of the case, bracelet, and movement; polishing of the case and metallic bracelet; replacement of worn movement components; reassembly; lubrication; placing the movement in the case; assembling the dial and hands; water–resistance test; and quality control. The company offers its products through its boutiques worldwide, as well as retailers. Blancpain S.A. was formerly known as Brown sent Egypt. 


Source-[businessweek][http://investing.businessweek.com/research/stocks/private/snapshot.asp?privcapId=22511512]
short_description: Blancpain manufactures, commercializes, and repairs watches and timepieces for men and women.

name: Venturelab
description: Venturelab was launched in 2004 as a national training program for innovative high-tech startups. Since it was originally mandated by the Commission for Technology and Innovation (CTI) to coordinate the initiative, the IFJ Institute for Young Entrepreneurs has conducted over 3,122 venturelab course modules all over the country which included more than 27,211 participants.
short_description: Venturelab was launched in 2004 as a national training program for innovative high-tech startups.

name: Fastree3D
description:
Fastree3D imaging sensors help recognize and measure distance to fast moving objects in real-time, enabling driving assistance or autonomous navigation.  
Fastree3D SA is a fabless semiconductor company, spin-off from EPFL Lausanne, Switzerland founded in September 2013 (UID CHE-291.330.490). The company subsidiary Fastree3D B.V. performs research with TU-Delft, Netherlands (KvK 58866973).
short_description: Fastree3D imaging sensors help recognize and measure distance to fast moving objects in real-time, enabling automotive safety.

name: Luma7
description: Luma7 is a concept generation engine that helps you discover new ideas automatically. Luma7 is a startup based in Switzerland working on the domain of concept analysis and text mining.
short_description: Luma7 is a concept generation engine that helps you discover new ideas automatically.

name: IndustriALL
description:
IndustriALL is a global union that represents workers in the mining, energy, and manufacturing sectors. The organization fights challenges the power of multinational companies and negotiates with them on a global level while fighting for another model of globalization as well as a new economic and social model. 

IndustriALL strives to build stronger unions; organize and increase union membership; fight for trade union rights; fight against precarious work; build union power to confront global capital; promote industrial policy and sustainability; promote social justice and globalization; ensure equal rights and women’s participation; create safe workplaces; and improve democracy and inclusiveness. It represents workers in a wide range of sectors from extraction of oil and gas, mining, generation and distribution of electric power, to manufacturing of metals and metal products, shipbuilding, automotive, aerospace, mechanical engineering, electronics, chemicals, rubber, pulp and paper, building materials, textiles, garments, leather and footwear, and environmental services.

IndustriALL was founded in June 2012 and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: IndustriALL is a global union that represents workers in the mining, energy, and manufacturing sectors.

name: Aionav
description: AIONAV Systems AG was founded in 2011 as a spin-off from Graz University of Technology, based in Berne. The developer team of founder Ulrich Walder, former head of the Institute of Construction Informatics at Graz University of Technology, includes Thomas Bernoulli, Martin Krammer and Philipp Rausch. In addition to the aionav app technology, the autonomous indoor and outdoornavigation is one of the development priorities of the company.
short_description: AIONAV Systems offers autonomous indoor and outdoor navigation solutions and app creation technologies.

name: Amphasys
description:
Amphasys is a technology company focused on its activities in developing and marketing a novel, chip-based single cell analysis technology. Its aim is to simplify, speed up, and miniaturize complex cell analyses and move them to the point-of-use, which may be outside well-equipped research and analytical laboratories.

The company’s basic technology has been developed in 2004 in collaboration with the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne. Consequently, several years of research with different cell types proved that the technology is suitable for a wide array of applications. It is currently being used in the analysis of pollen and milk.

In 2013 Amphasys was awarded with the most prestigious Swiss startup price by the W.A. de Vigier Foundation. It was also supported by the Albert Koechlin Foundation and certified by CTI Invest.

Amphasys was founded in 2012 as a spin-off from Axetris AG, a company of the Leister group.
short_description: Amphasys provides a label-free solution.

name: The Bank for International Settlements
description:
The Bank for International Settlements (BIS) is an international financial organization that is responsible for serving central banks in their pursuit of monetary and financial stability, fostering international cooperation in those areas, and acting as a bank for central banks. The bank is the world’s oldest international financial organization and it has 60 member central banks, representing countries from around the world that together make up about 95% of world GDP. Its customers are central banks and international organizations and it does not accept deposits from or provide financial services to private individuals or corporate entities.

The Bank for International Settlements’ duties include: fostering discussion and facilitating collaboration among central banks; supporting dialogue with other authorities that are responsible for promoting financial stability; carrying out research and policy analysis on issues of relevance for monetary and financial stability; acting as a prime counterparty for centr...
short_description: The Bank for International Settlements functions as a prime counterparty for central banks in their financial transactions.

name: MakeSends
description:
MakeSends is a web-based service that transfers user documents to a digital safe to keep their data protected.

The platform uses end-to-end encryption to protect files. All files are encrypted inside the browser before the user leaves the computer, and decrypted only on the computer of the receiver. Files are never decrypted along this path, leaving no possibility for hackers or surveillance agencies to obtain a copy of the original file.
short_description: MakeSends is a web-based service that transfers user documents to a digital safe to keep their data protected.

name: Benjie Of Switzerland
description: Benjie Of Switzerland is a shoe brand that manufactures shoes for children with specialist guidance. Its shoes are designed with a light and flexible sole, making it comfortable to wear.
short_description: Benjie Of Switzerland is a shoe brand that manufactures shoes for children with specialist guidance.

name: Avina Stiftung
description:
Avina Stiftung is a private philanthropic foundation that makes grants for environmental sustainability and natural resources. It actively enters into partnerships with other non-profit foundations and networks people and organizations which deal with similar issues. Thus, its projects profit from a network of various expertise and experience and a widespread effect. 

Avina Stiftung also provides carefully targeted start-up funding, therefore enabling projects to prove themselves. This provides the basis for further investors to get involved in the projects in a second phase. It offers its partners as a valuable source for the exchange of information, the acquisition of new knowledge, and the further development of professional foundation activity. It is headquartered in Zürich.
short_description: Avina Stiftung is a private philanthropic foundation that makes grants for environmental sustainability and natural resources.

name: Everbloom LLC
description:
Everbloom is a document-centric online accounting platform for SMBs. It was launched by Sébastien Cuendet, Guillaume Zufferey, and Patrick Meyer in 2014.

Everbloom is based in Bevaix, Switzerland.
short_description: Document-centric online accounting platform for SMBs

name: Grand Conseil de la République et Canton de Genève
description:
The Grand Council is the legislative body of the township. 
It is composed of 100 members , elected every four years by the electorate by party list in one college, according to the principle of proportional representation tempered by a quorum 7%. The age of eligibility is 18 years. 

The Grand Council's core business of the Grand Council is to legislate. The Council of State Members may submit draft laws, which are generally referred to committee for study, unless there is an immediate decision to refuse cookies or to adopt forthwith.
short_description: The Grand Council is the legislative body of the township.

name: Airlight Energy
description:
Airlight Energy develops solar technologies for large-scale production of electricity and thermal energy, and for energy storage.

It offers concentrated solar power systems for electricity generation and industrial process heat applications; concentrated photovoltaic systems for the energy intensive industry and large utilities; and solutions for concentrated photo voltaic and advanced adiabatic compressed air energy storage markets.

Airlight Energy was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Biasca, Switzerland.
short_description: Airlight Energy develops solar technologies for large-scale production of electricity and thermal energy, and for energy storage.

name: Swiss Starter
description:
Swiss Starter is an equity crowdfunding platform that connects entrepreneurs with investors and helps them raise funds to develop their startups. The platform supports startups in the fields of arts, biotech, dance, design, fashion, film and video, finance, food, games, healthcare, music, photography, technology, and theatre.

Swiss Starter is operated from Lugano, Switzerland.
short_description: Swiss Starter, an equity crowdfunding platform, connects entrepreneurs with investors and helps them raise funds to develop their startups.

name: Micro & Nano Engineering
description: MNE is a major annual international conference, devoted to micro and nano engineering, held in a European country every September. The conference brings together engineers and scientists from across the world to discuss recent progress and future trends in the fabrication, manufacturing, operation and application of micro and nano-structures and devices. Applications in electronics, magnetics, photonics, electromechanics, environment and life sciences are also discussed. MNE 2014 will be the 40th conference in a series that was started in Cambridge in 1975 and which was held most recently in Athens (2008), Ghent (2009), Genoa (2010), Berlin (2011), Toulouse (2012) and London (2013). In September 2014, MNE will take place in Lausanne, Switzerland in the new Swiss Tech Conference Center on the beautiful EPFL campus overlooking Lake Geneva and the Savoy Alps. It is estimated that the conference will attract 500-800 participants.
short_description: MNE is a major annual international conference, devoted to micro and nano engineering.

name: startupticker
description:
startupticker.ch is the online platform for young entrepreneurs, innovators and supporters. The hub increases the visibility of young Swiss companies and serves to highlight the diverse and vibrant start-up scene.
The news portal provides daily information on company results, launch of innovations, growth, financing, exits, support services, events and award tenders. The most important news and events of the week from the start-up community are sent out in a weekly newsletter.
The news portal communicates in English, German, French and Italian. This hub of the Swiss start-up scene is operated by the Startupticker Association, a public-private partnership initiative from CTI Start-up, CTI Invest and the WA de Vigier Foundation.
short_description: The independent Swiss innovation news channel.

name: ZWOOKY
description:
Although ZWOOKY is used primarily for establishing contact, it is not a social media platform and will not replace it. 

ZWOOKY is a contact system. But it can do much more and has a very versatile application. For example, for labelling (suitcases, keys, etc.), as a serial number or for product registration, linking / forwarding (publicity, advertisements). 
In some distant future one can also use ZWOOKY to make calls and its code can be used as scanning code. 

The ever increasing need of Internet users to protect their privacy gave Thomas Stoll the idea of a new contact system. The idea developed during the search for a new option for socializing without disclosing e-mail, telephone number or personal data and over the course of 20 months matured into what ZWOOKY is today. And the idea continues to grow ...
short_description: ZWOOKY is an anonymous secure messaging platform, using assigned digit as an user ID.

name: ChromaCon
description:
ChromaCon is a private life science tool company that implements novel cyclic and continuous chromatography process principles, corresponding operating software, and control on chromatography hardware systems. The resulting systems provide significant CAPEX and OPEX cost savings, allow faster processing, and enable scalable chromatographic solutions for large scale purification applications.

ChromaCon offers two equipment lines which include Contichrom CUBE and Contichrom CUBE Combined: modular twin–column lab-scale equipment for biopharmaceutical protein process development applications, operated at medium pressure; and Contichrom Lab-10 and Prep-100 systems: twin–column lab-prep scale equipment for small and large molecules, operated at high pressure. Contichrom Lab-10 and Prep-100 is marketed through a partner company called Knauer.

Both the equipment lines of the company are operated by the ChromIQ software, which offers multiple process choices for single and twin-column operations using all chromatogr.
short_description: ChromaCon is a private life science tool company that manufactures cyclic and continuous downstream operations.

name: Cognita
description: Cognita develops and operates the issue and media monitoring blueReport. The state-of-the-art «Software as a Service» (SaaS) solution is continually enhanced by their own team of developers. cognita AG customers include leading companies, organisations, media and communication agencies in Europe. Christian Beilborn and Denis Nordmann founded, in 2008, the spin-off of ETH Zurich and today employ at cognita over 25 employees at their Berlin and Zurich offices.
short_description: Cognita set the standard for issue and media monitoring.

name: Technopark Academy
description: Technopark Academy offers a training program for startups and emerging companies. It is housed by Technopark Zürich, a technopark based in the municipality of Zürich in the Canton of Zürich, Switzerland.
short_description: Technopark Academy offers a training program for startups and emerging companies.

name: Rino Electronics
description: Rino Electronics develops and assembles retrofit ice storage with model-based controllers, the cost here is in the foreground. They offer their own low-cost data logger for current voltage and temperature measurements. Together they bring down the cost and look forward to a clean environment.
short_description: Rino Electronics develops and assembles retrofit ice storage with model-based controllers.

name: Smallpdf
description: Smallpdf is the first PDF software you will actually like the development and distribution of software. The Company's may establish branches and affiliates both domestically and abroad, and participate in other domestic and foreign companies, and may conduct any business that is directly or indirectly related to its purpose. The company may acquire, encumber, dispose and manage real estate at home and abroad. It may also make financing for its own or third-party account, as well as provide guarantees and guarantees to subsidiaries and third parties.
short_description: Smallpdf is the first PDF software you will actually like.

name: IP-Max
short_description: IP-Max offers telecommunication and data center hosting services with a proven track record of setting up complex network solutions.

name: Brainserve
short_description: Brainserve is a provider of hosting services in a highest level infrastructure.

name: Gratek AG
short_description: Gratek AG is a swiss based software development company that owns, operates and develops IT projects.

name: Solar Impulse
description:
Solar Impulse is a Swiss long-range solar-powered aircraft project. This has demonstrated that a solar-powered airplane can fly day and night without fuel. Through this project, Solar Impulse has opened up new prospects for energy saving and clean technologies.

By introducing solar energy to aviation, and travelling around the world without fuel or pollution, Solar Impulse’s ambition is for the world of exploration and innovation to contribute to the cause of renewable energies, and to demonstrate the importance of clean technologies for sustainable development.

Solar Impulse has won several international and local awards, including Brunswick Prize 2009; Clarins Men Prize 2010; Watt d'or Prize 2010; Solar Swiss Prize 2010; European Solar Prize 2010; Icare Prize 2010; Best of What's New 2010; Lindbergh Electric Aircraft Prize 2011 for Aviation and Space, and SolarWorld Einstein Award 2011.

Solar Impulse was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Lausanne.
short_description: Solar Impulse is a Swiss solar-powered aircraft project, which has proved that a solar-powered airplane can fly day and night without fuel.

name: Hygienics
description:
The hyShell can be installed easily. All elements are easily glued. Laborious Boren, removing the door or bringing in an expert is therefore not necessary.

Immediately after the installation is the hyShell ready.
short_description: The hyShell can be installed easily. In a few steps the product is ready for use. No removal of the door, no expert and no tedious Boren.

name: StartUp Weekend Schweiz
description: Startup Weekend Schweiz is an association dedicated to the interdisciplinary promotion of youth entrepreneurship. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
short_description: Startup Weekend Schweiz is an association dedicated to the interdisciplinary promotion of youth entrepreneurship.

name: SwissUpStart Challenge
description:
SwissUpStart Challenge is a support program with an integrated competition that offers funding and support services for startups. It is part of the Swiss Challenge.

The program offers entrepreneurs with individual coaching and counseling services, and crowd thinking and networking opportunities. Entrepreneurs can pitch their business ideas at the competition and get rewarded with prizes.

The best business idea in each category is awarded with CHF 20,000, the second with CHF 3,000, and the third with CHF 2,000. The prizes are provided either for starting a business, to clarify and develop the potential of the business idea submitted or the professionalization of the business plan, and for the management of the company.

SwissUpStart Challenge is organized in Windisch, Switzerland.
short_description: SwissUpStart Challenge is a support program with an integrated competition that offers funding and support services for startups.

name: SuccessionCenter
description: SuccessionCenter was launched in mid-2013 as an independent website and is operated by Centralize GmbH . In 2014, they took second place in the context of the SwissUpStart Challenge of the University of Applied Sciences and Arts Northwestern Switzerland. Since 2015, they have the largest directory of succession specialists. They work daily to achieve their vision. For you and entrepreneurship.
short_description: SuccessionCenter offers succession planning solutions for businesses and individuals.

name: Sintratec
description: Sintratec is a Swiss tech startup that manufactures and commercializes desktop laser sintering three-dimensional (3D) printers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Aarau, Switzerland.
short_description: Sintratec is a Swiss tech startup that manufactures and commercializes desktop laser sintering three-dimensional printers.

name: Symbiotics Group
description:
Symbiotics Group is an investment company that offers market research, investment advisory, brokerage, and asset management services. It works for institutional investors such as investment funds, asset managers, development banks, and pension funds.

The company invests in microfinance and offers SME finance, social housing, sustainable agriculture, and energy efficiency opportunities. It supports financial institutions, mostly microfinance institutions but also more generally financing intermediaries which target micro-, small, and medium enterprises and low income households in emerging economies.

Symbiotics Group was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland with offices in Cape Town, London, Zurich, Mexico City, and Singapore.
short_description: Symbiotics Group is an investment company that offers market research, investment advisory, brokerage, and asset management services.

name: PurEco LED
description:
PurEco LED designs, develops, and distributes optimal lighting solutions for industrial purposes, offices, shops, sports venues, and street applications. The company offers a range of LED lights, spotlights, floodlights, LED tubes, and LED lamps.

PurEco LED is based in Obwalden, Switzerland.
short_description: PurEco LED develops and distributes lighting solutions for industrial purposes, offices, shops, sports venues, and street applications.

name: Coople
description:
Coople is a leading marketplace for on-demand work and the simplest link between employee and employer. 

The software and services company is d for six years It's the leading marketplace for on-demand work and the simplest link between employee and employer. Registered companies will find the necessary skills for flexible work assignments around the clock with Coople. Employees reduce Coople's job search efforts to a minimum and offer them the opportunity to personalize their work lives and adapt them to their own individual lives.

Coople employs around 100 people in its offices in Zurich, Lausanne and London. Coople connects more than 120,000 registered employees with over 6,000 employers in Switzerland. 98% of jobs are filled in less than 4 hours via the online marketplace. Coople's focus is on the hotel and restaurant, events & promotion, retail, logistics, healthcare and commercial and administrative professions.
short_description: Coople is a leading marketplace for on-demand work and the simplest link between employee and employer.

name: Glice
description: Glice is a Swiss company that manufactures ecological, synthetic ice-skating rinks. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Luzern, Switzerland.
short_description: Glice is a Swiss company that manufactures ecological, synthetic ice-skating rinks.

name: Holz & Funktion - HF
description:
Holz & Funktion offers a range of property-specific component solutions and products for building with wood. Its product portfolio includes plaster and insulation, construction timber, room acoustics, ceiling structures, air and wind seals, fasteners, lintel elements, system accessories, mineral insulation, ventilated walls, and more.

Holz & Funktion was founded in 2011 and is based in Wauwil, Switzerland.
short_description: Holz & Funktion offers a range of property-specific component solutions and products for building with wood.

name: RobecoSAM
description:
Founded in 1995, RobecoSAM is an investment specialist focused exclusively on Sustainability Investing. It offers asset management, indices, engagement, voting, impact analysis, sustainability assessments, and benchmarking services. Asset management capabilities cater to institutional asset owners and financial intermediaries and cover a range of ESG-integrated investments (in public and private equity), featuring a strong track record in resource efficiency theme strategies. Together with S&P Dow Jones Indices, RobecoSAM publishes the globally recognized Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI). Based on its Corporate Sustainability Assessment, an annual ESG analysis of 2,800 listed companies, RobecoSAM has compiled one of the world’s most comprehensive databases of financially material sustainability information.

RobecoSAM is a member of the global pure-play asset manager Robeco, which was established in 1929 and is the center of expertise for asset management within the ORIX Corporation. As a reflection of its own commitment to advocating sustainable investment practices, RobecoSAM is a signatory of the UNPRI and a member of Eurosif, ASrIA and Ceres. Approximately 130 professionals work for RobecoSAM, which is headquartered in Zurich. As of December 31, 2013, RobecoSAM had assets under management, advice and/or license in listed and private equity* of approximately USD 10.2 billion. Additionally, RobecoSAM’s Governance & Active Ownership team** had USD 74 billion of assets under engagement and USD 51.8 billion of assets under voting.
short_description: Founded in 1995, RobecoSAM is an investment specialist focused exclusively on Sustainability Investing.

name: Videopong
description:
Videopong is a community dedicated to expanding and connecting the world of VJs and video art. It also operates as a hub which enables its users to share video clips as well as source code, interactive patches, executables, and more.

Videopong is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
short_description: Videopong is a community dedicated to expanding and connecting the world of VJs and video art.

name: ChartChecking
description: ChartChecking is a simple minimalist technical analysis website which does analysis of a reduced number of underlyings, using only a limited set of indicators.
short_description: Minimalist Technical Analysis Website

name: nViso
description:
nViso develops software solutions for detecting human emotions based on an analysis of facial expressions and eye movements.

It develops technologies for interpreting emotions for the marketing industry. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

It provides the most scalable, robust, and accurate artificial intelligence solutions to measure instantaneous emotional reactions of consumers in online and retail environments. They provide real-time and highly actionable information for Market Research, Brands, Creative Agencies and R&D Product Development.
short_description: nViso is a Switzerland-based company that develops software solutions to detect human emotions based on the facial and eye expressions.

name: Fondation Suisa
description: Foundation Suisa is an online platform that aims to promote Swiss music. The platform offers prizes, scholarship information, trade fair and event information, funding details, and more. It is operated from Lausanne.
short_description: Foundation Suisa is an online platform that aims to promote Swiss music.

name: Pearl Technology
description:
Headquartered in Schlieren / Zurich, Pearl Technology AG develops, produces and delivers solutions for the optimal storage, fixation and positioning of patients. Their products are based on unique, patented technology developed in collaboration with ETH Zurich and renowned university hospitals.

They have set theirselves the goal to use the technology competence of Pearl Technology AG for the benefit of humans, animals and industry and to create added value for their customers by excellent quality and convincing application advantages.

Pearl Technology AG is certified according to ISO standard 13485. This certification certifies that their quality management system for the development and manufacture of medical devices meets the highest international standards.
short_description: Pearltec is a technology company focused on placement, positioning, and fixation solutions for patients in research imaging studies.

name: Stromer
description: myStromer develops and markets innovative e-bikes. The strength of the company lies in the development of and mechanical components, electric components, software, and the complete system integration. The Swiss company was founded in 2009 by Thomas Binggeli. In March, 2013 the company opened its headquarters in Oberwangen near Bern, Switzerland. The entire facility’s energy is provided by rooftop solar cells, and every battery used in the assembly of Stromer e-bikes is filled with solar-derived energy. At the Oberwangen campus, management, engineering, research and development, assembly, logistics, customer service and even a Stromer flagship retail store are located under one roof. A second assembly location for the European market is located in Riedstadt, Germany.
short_description: myStromer develops and markets innovative e-bikes.

name: Air Food One
description: Air Food One is a subscription food delivery service that has teamed up with grocery company AllYouNeed.com and LGS Sky Chefs to bring leftover airline food right to the door of anyone living in Germany.
short_description: Subscription food delivery service

name: Spamhaus Project
description:
Street & Smith's Sports Business Daily is a daily trade publication on the business of sports that offers relevant original features by its experienced editorial staff.

It is a complete daily compilation of real-time news and information for sports executives, tracking more than 500 news sources worldwide, including online, newspapers, television, and radio. Street & Smith's Sports Business Daily is an essential part of the [Street & Smith's Sports Group](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/street-smiths-sports-group).

Monday through Friday, the publications summarize industry news reported by more than 600 media outlets in the United States, Canada, Europe, Africa, India, Asia, Australia, and South America.
short_description: Street & Smith's Sports Business Daily is a daily trade publication on sports that offers relevant original features by its editorial staff.

name: Ethereum Foundation
description:
Ethereum is a platform and a programming language that makes it possible for any developer to build and publish next-generation distributed applications.

Ethereum can be used to codify, decentralize, secure and trade just about anything: voting, domain names, financial exchanges, crowdfunding, company governance, contracts and agreements of most kind, intellectual property, and even smart property thanks to hardware integration.

Ethereum borrows the concept of decentralized consensus that makes bitcoin so resilient, yet makes it trivial to build on its foundation.
short_description: Ethereum is a platform and a programming language that helps developers to build and publish next-generation distributed applications.

name: Reeder
description:
Reeder is a news reading application available for iOS and Mac.

It reads RSS feeds offline from Feedbin, Feedly, Feed Wrangler, FeedHQ, NewsBlur, The Old Reader, Inoreader, Minimal Reader, BazQux Reader, Fever, and Readability.
short_description: Reeder is a news reading application available for iOS and Mac.

name: noonee
description:
noonee is the world’s first supplier of Wearble Ergonomic Mechatronic Devices (WEMDs). These are simple devices focussed on improving ergonomics in the manufacturing industry, similar to exoskeletons but practical.

noonee AG was founded in 2014 in Switzerland. In July 2016, noonee germany GmbH was created as the first step of worldwide roll-out of the Chairless Chair.

The device was developed in continuous feedback exchange with corporate clients and end users.
short_description: Noonee is a technology company that develops wearable mechatronic technology based on research.

name: Imperix
description:
Imperix provides advanced control solutions for power electronic applications. The company commercializes hardware and software solutions related to the implementation of pilot systems and plants in the field of power conversion, energy storage, and smart grids. The Powertrench converters allow Imperix to provide customers with tailor-made solutions over a broad range of topologies and power ratings.

The BoomBox is an industrial-grade control platform designed by Imperix to help R&D engineers speed up their power electronic developments.

Imperix was founded in 2013 and is based in Sion, Switzerland. It is a spin-off the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology, Lausanne (EPFL).
short_description: imperix is a technology provider of advanced power conversion solutions.

name: Médecins Sans Frontières
description:
Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) is an international, independent medical humanitarian aid organization that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, healthcare exclusion, and natural or man-made disasters. The organization was established to speak out publicly to bring forgotten crisis to public attention, to alert the public on abuses occurring beyond the headlines, to criticize the inadequacies of the aid system, and to challenge the diversion of humanitarian aid for political interests.

MSF offers basic healthcare, performs surgery, fights epidemics, rehabilitates and runs hospitals and clinics, carries out vaccination campaigns, operates nutrition centers, and provides mental healthcare.

The organization’s activities include the treatment of injuries and disease, maternal care, and the provision of humanitarian aid. Where necessary, it also sets up sanitation systems, supplies safe drinking water, and distributes relief to assist survival.

Thousands of MSF health professionals, logistical and administrative staff, work on programs in some 70 countries worldwide.

Médecins Sans Frontières was founded in Paris, France in 1971. Today, it is a worldwide movement of 24 associations, bound together as MSF International, based in Switzerland.

Médecins Sans Frontières has offices in 20 countries: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Holland, Hong Kong, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Korea, Luxembourg, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, and the U.S. It has an international office in Geneva, an access to essential medicines campaign office in Geneva, and two U.N. liaison offices, one in Geneva and one in New York City. Eight MSF branch offices operate in Argentina, Czech Republic, Brazil, India, Ireland, Mexico, South Africa, and United Arab Emirates.
short_description: MSF delivers emergency medical aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, healthcare exclusion, and natural or man-made disasters.

name: Sirius Healthcare Partners
description:
Sirius Healthcare Partners provides independent advice to small and mid-cap Healthcare companies, venture capital firms, institutional and private investors in Europe and selectively in Middle East, Asia and the US. Our unique business model combines Strategic advisory, M&A advisory and Financing advisory services for Healthcare companies and for investors targeting investments within the Healthcare sector. 

We provide our clients with deep sector knowledge, tailor-made solutions and bespoke intelligent execution without any conflict of interest with our clients’ principal activities. 

Our sector focus, combined with committed experienced senior resources, enable us to generate creative opportunities for our clients and to implement thoughtful approaches to transactions, thus achieving optimal results and enhancing value.
short_description: Sirius Healthcare Partners is an advisory firm, providing strategy consulting, M&A, and financing advisory services to healthcare companies.

name: Biowatch
description:
Biowatch is a user-friendly wrist veins biometric reader that functions as a security solution for mobile payment protection and smart device interaction. Users can access the app for enrolling their vein pattern and selecting applications and devices that needs to be connected to their Biowatch, wear their BioWatch and activate it by matching their vein pattern with their enrolled reference, get PKI encrypted user code transmitted from their Biowatch, and start opening doors without the use of keys and passwords.

Biowatch was launched by Joe Rice and Matthias Vanoni and is headquartered in Lausanne, Switzerland.
short_description: BioWatch, a wrist veins biometric reader, functions as a security solution for smartwatches.

name: Eyra
description:
Eyra makes a wearable device that assists blind and visually impaired individuals with their day-to-day activities. The device analyzes its surroundings, obtains useful information through text reading, objects, and people recognition, obstacle detection; and audibly communicates them to the users through voice.

Eyra was founded by Luca Nardelli and Saverio Murgia in 2014 and is based in Lugano, Switzerland and also has offices in Milan, Italy.
short_description: Eyra makes a wearable device that assists blind and visually impaired individuals with their day-to-day activities.

name: Octapharma AG
description:
Octapharma is a privately-owned global human proteins manufacturer headquartered in Lachen, Switzerland. Since its establishment in 1983 the company has been dedicated to improving the lives of patients. 

Octapharma was founded in 1983 on the fundamental principle of improving the lives of patients. Since then we have remained focused on our collective responsibility for the trust instilled in us by physicians and patients worldwide. In 2012, the Octapharma Board identified the core strategic pillars which will lead to the achievement of the organization’s ambitious long term goals.
short_description: Octapharma is a human protein products manufacturer.

name: Cardiorentis
description:
Cardiorentis is a privately owned biopharmaceutical company designed for the new world of drug development. Focused, fast moving and flexible, with patients at its heart, Cardiorentis AG is committed to bringing novel therapies to the treatment of heart failure and related cardiovascular diseases.

Cardiorentis fuses superior science and pharmaceutical intelligence, offering a company with a genuine thirst for scientific advancement, but with the practical know-how to be able to bring products to the market and enhance the lives of patients. With a notable expertise in cardiology, Cardiorentis AG is initially concentrating its efforts on ularitide for the treatment of acute cardiovascular indications, with the aim of developing the first evidence-based drug treatment for acute heart failure (AHF).

Cardiorentis is proud of the strong partnerships it has built with academic researchers, universities and practicing clinicians across the world; all working closely together to drive important research forward.
