United by their common goal, they believe that their actions today will shape the future of patient care tomorrow.

Cardiorentis was founded in 2010 and acquired CardioPep Pharma GmbH of Hannover, Germany. Cardiorentis AG is based in Zug Switzerland.
short_description: Cardiorentis is a privately owned biopharmaceutical company.

name: Jobydu
description: Jobydu is a real-time web portal connecting companies and workforce management organizations with temporary workers, enabling employers to effectively manage, communicate, and hire temps in real-time. Jobydu provides a direct and cost-effective way for employers to fill temp job vacancies; employers simply define their basic requirements for each temp, and submit that information to Jobydu, along with other details about the position they would like to fill. Jobydu then automatically broadcasts each job offer to qualified temps within the Jobydu network; eligible temps can then book any positions they want in real-time.
short_description: Jobydu is a real-time web portal connecting companies and workforce management organizations with temporary workers.

name: WhoWantsMe
description: WhoWantsMe is a web portal aiming to revolutionize hotel bookings by reversing the traditional reservation process. WhoWantsMe establishes consumer demand for hotel rooms first, and then enables hotels to bid for such stated demand in real-time. Rather than make the consumer search for hotel rooms, WhoWantsMe makes the hotels dynamically compete for the consumer. By turning the reservation process into a reverse auction, consumers no longer need to go through online travel agencies and the hassle associated with them to book hotel rooms.
short_description: WhoWantsMe is a web portal aiming to revolutionize hotel bookings by reversing the traditional reservation process.

name: Lift Conference
description:
Lift Conference is a series of events built around a community of pioneers who get together in Europe and Asia to explore the social implications of new technologies. Lift Conference organizes international event series and open innovation programs in Europe and Asia, and through these events it discovers the business and social implications of technological innovation. It is a key partner for organizations and individuals wishing to identify the current challenges and creative solutions presented by emerging technologies. It gathers observers, explorers, and builders from around the world. 

Lift Conference has built created and built a community and project portfolio contributing to and benefiting from the knowledge and contacts created through its events. It has received over 15,000 participants from 40 countries in over 30 events during last five years. 

Lift Conference was founded in 2006 and is based in Geneva. Since 2006 Lift Events explores the business and social implications of technological innovation through the organisation of international event series and open innovation programs in Europe and Asia. By gathering observers, explorers and builders from around the world, Lift is a key partner for organizations and individuals wishing to identify the current challenges and creative solutions presented by emerging technologies. Over the years, they have created and built a community and project portfolio contributing to and benefiting from the knowledge and contacts created through our events. Since 2006 they have welcomed over 15'000 participants from 40 countries in over 30 events.
short_description: Lift Conference is a series of events to inspire the community of creators exploring the social impact of new technologies.

name: Business Model Foundry
description:
Business Model Foundry offers products and solutions to build up a business model.


It offers The Business Model Canvas, a strategic management and entrepreneurial tool that allows its users to describe, design, challenge, invent, and pivot their business model. The company also offers a web application to design, refine, and improve a business model online.
short_description: Business Model Foundry offers products and solutions to build up a business model.

name: International Organization for Standardization
description:
The International Organization for Standardization promotes worldwide proprietary, industrial, and commercial standards.


The ISO comprises national standards bodies representing 165 countries and serves a variety of functions. It facilitates communication and cooperation among its members, eases the distribution of scientific and technical information on standards and standardization, operates over 2,850 technical groups devoted to standards and other commercial and industrial research, and maintains online databases covering international standards and other organizational activities. The ISO also seeks to ensure that standards are not used as a non-tariff barrier to international trade by formulating international standards applicable to the full scope of commercial activity in any locale worldwide.


Although the majority of standards promulgated by the ISO are the result of the internal activities of its technical committees and working groups, ISO standards are not necessarily handed down to companies from the central organization. Companies often send their own internal standards to the ISO for consideration as international standards. Similarly, national standards organizations work with the ISO to make accepted national standards internationally applicable.


ISO standards cover the entire spectrum of scientific, industrial, and commercial activities, including computer operating systems, manufacturing processes, product quality, safety, management technique, and environmental protection. In addition to its specific quality standards, the ISO has issued two sets of general standards, ISO 9000 and ISO 14000, to govern manufacturing and organizational processes and environmental protection, respectively.


The International Organization for Standardization officially began its operations in February 1947.
short_description: The International Organization for Standardization promotes worldwide proprietary, industrial, and commercial standards.

name: Alp ICT
description: Alp ICT is a startup accelerator for technology enterprises in Switzerland. The company provides networking services for SMEs, new business opportunities, a platform for open innovation, research facilities, and more.
short_description: Alp ICT is a startup accelerator for technology enterprises in Switzerland.

name: Mammut
description:
Mammut develops, manufactures, and sells ropes, netting products, belts, and equipment for mountaineering and outdoor pursuits. The company offers apparel, such as jackets and vests, pants and shorts, shirts and pulls, and baselayers as well as footwear and various accessories for men and women.

It also provides alpine, climbing, trekking, hiking, multifunction, ski touring, free riding, and children backpacks; ropes and cords; helmets, carabiners, express sets, belay devices, slings and webbings, harnesses, and climbing accessories; safety products such as airbags, transceivers, shovels, and probes; sleeping systems comprising bags, mats, and accessories; and headlamps.

The company was founded in 1862 and is based in Seon, Switzerland with subsidiary companies in Germany, Norway, Japan, Korea, China, and the United States.
short_description: Mammut develops, manufactures, and sells ropes, netting products, belts, and equipment for mountaineering and outdoor pursuits.

name: Archilogic
description: Archilogic combines deep knowledge of architecture, design, 3D workflows, computer vision and coding to create visually stunning and powerful 3D interiors in the web – for everyone, anywhere, anytime. Go to places that no longer exist, that don’t exist yet and everything else in between.
short_description: Archilogic's platform empowers users to easily create, edit, and share 3D content for interiors.

name: Tissot
description:
Tissot, with its signature 'Innovators by Tradition', has been pioneering craftsmanship and innovation since its foundation in 1853. Today Tissot is a member of the Swatch Group, the world's largest watch producer and distributor. The company has always had its home in the Swiss watchmaking town of Le Locle in the Jura Mountains but now also has a presence in 160 countries.

The Tissot innovation leadership is enabled by the development of high-tech products, special materials and advanced functionality. With a broader, more versatile range of high-quality timepieces at an attractive price than any other Swiss watch brand, Tissot also expresses its commitment to making excellence accessible.

As official timekeeper and partner of FIBA, AFL, MotoGP™, FIM Superbike and the World Championships of cycling, fencing and ice hockey, Tissot is committed to respecting tradition, underlining its core values of performance, precision and setting new standards.
short_description: Tissot produces Swiss made watches.

name: Startups.ch
description:
Startups.ch is a public limited company that provides consultancy services for startups. Its services include trust services, tax consulting, trademark protection, legal services, and practical entrepreneurial schooling. It also holds the annual Swiss Startups Awards. Since its inception, over 8000 young businesses have been successfully founded through Startups.ch. Its customers get advised and supported in the national languages as well as English.

Startups.ch was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Winterthur with branches in Geneva and Lugano. The company is fully owned by Nexus and is represented in 20 different locations all over Switzerland.
short_description: Startups.ch is a public limited company that provides consultancy services for startups.

name: MSM Group
description:
MSM Group is an inter-disciplinary international team that provides professional support in the fields of economics, law, and office services.

The company offers support to small- and medium-sized enterprises in Switzerland, especially in areas such as startup and relocation to Switzerland; succession, mergers and acquisitions, and other transitions; and daily business. Its interdisciplinary services include business planning; accounting, HR administration, and insurance brokerage; advice and representation in Swiss and international business law; and more.

MSM Group is based in Winterthur, Switzerland.
short_description: MSM Group, an inter-disciplinary international team, provides professional support in the fields of economics, law, and office services.

name: GeNeuro
description:
GeNeuro is a biotechnology company that develops therapeutic drugs for diseases associated with the expression of pathogenic proteins of the human endogenous retroviral origin.

The company is primarily focused on nervous system diseases such as multiple sclerosis and schizophrenia. Its products include GNbAC1, a therapeutic monoclonal antibody for the treatment of multiple sclerosis. It also develops diagnostic tests to dose the multiple sclerosis associated retrovirus-ENV protein in patients.

GeNeuro was founded in 2006 and is based in Plan-les-Ouates, Switzerland. It has a strategic partnership with Servier.
short_description: GeNeuro develops innovative treatments against inflammatory and degenerative disorders associated with endogenous retroviruses.

name: Lamina Technologies
description:
Lamina Technologies is a Swiss manufacturer of carbide cutting tools specialized in milling and turning inserts made of state-of-the-art sub-micron grades and PVD coatings. The company’s catalog includes turning, parting, threading, milling, drilling, and solid-mill tools. Its production processes of carbide products are made in-house.

Lamina Technologies is headquartered in Vaud, Switzerland with worldwide presence in over 32 countries.
short_description: Lamina Technologies manufactures carbide cutting tools, including turning, parting, threading, milling, drilling, and solid-mill tools.

name: Rotavis
description:
Rotavis is a dynamic chair company, providing its users with dynamic office chairs. The seat of its new office chair revolves around the natural movement of the center of its users’ body. Therefore, its users have the ability to move freely during concentrated work.

Rotavis is based in Winterthur.
short_description: Rotavis is a dynamic chair company, providing its users with dynamic office chairs.

name: Motilis Medica
description:
Motilis Medica is a Swiss company with an innovative pill based technology for diagnosis of the digestive system. They improve the management of patients with functional diseases such as constipation, diarrhea, IBS or gastroparesis.

Motilis GI motility monitoring system (MTS) covers the entire gastrointestinal tract, providing the physician with segmental transit time, 3D detailed dynamics of progression and motility indices.

Motilis ambulatory examination is minimally invasive and comfortable for the patient. Unpleasant tubes and X-rays are replaced by a small capsule that is ingested and transmits signals to an external data collection point over a period of 72 plus hours. The patient can maintain a normal life style and experiences no inconvenience.
short_description: Motilis Medica is a Swiss company with an innovative pill based technology for diagnosis of the digestive system.

name: VeinPress
description:
VeinPress is a Switzerland-based company that manufactures and markets products related to non-invasive venous pressure measurement.

The company’s four founding members include Ulrich Baumann, Vincent Baumann, Markus Widmer, and Eric Odenheimer. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Munsingen.
short_description: VeinPress is a Switzerland-based company that manufactures and markets products related to non-invasive venous pressure measurement.

name: Wemakeit
description:
Wemakeit is an online platform that enables users to crowdfund projects in the creative industries. While it enables innovators to gather funding for their projects, it enables donors to get personal invitations, signed books, limited edition photos, and more. 

Wemakeit is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
short_description: Wemakeit is an online platform that enables users to crowdfund projects in the creative industries.

name: TRI Dental Implants
description:
TRI Dental Implants develops, designs, and manufactures dental implant systems.

The company’s products include soft tissue concept, friction, and bone adaptation as well as sandblasted, large grit, and acid-etched (SBA) surface implant systems; vent implant products; narrow and octa implants; prosthetic products; and surgical kits for surgeons.

The company offers its products through a network of distributors in Australia, China, Columbia, Egypt, Greece, Hong Kong, Iraq, Iran, Lebanon, Morocco, the Netherlands, Portugal, Romania, the Russian Federation, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Taiwan, Turkey, and the United Arab Emirates; and directly to customers in Germany, Italy, France, Hungary, and the United Kingdom. It also enables its customers to order products online.

TRI Dental Implants was founded in 2011 and is based in Baar, Switzerland.
short_description: TRI Dental Implants develops, designs, and manufactures dental implant systems.

name: Valora International
description: Valora’s Retail division operates a network of kiosks and other small-outlet retail formats at heavily frequented sites in a number of European countries. Valora Retail provides a comprehensive marketing and distribution system for press products, daily consumer staples and impulse-purchase items.
short_description: Valora is an economically strong, independent trading company operating on a europe-wide scale.

name: Dealini
description:
Dealini is a social marketing game offering its users an opportunity to do effective and sustainable marketing. It differentiates itself from familiar promotions and platforms through gamification and a globally unique concept.

Dealinin was launched in 2011 and is based in Wallisellen.
short_description: Dealini is a social marketing game offering its users an opportunity to do effective and sustainable marketing.

name: cloud world ag
description: cloud world is a global, all-encompassing and innovative cloud marketplace that ensures transparency and neutrality. It offers all relevant information on cloud computing and helps customers to find cloud software and -services that fit their individual needs and requirements. The cloud world ag was founded 2013 in Switzerland. It operates under the top domains cloud.de / .ch / .at / *.li).
short_description: B2B marketplace around cloud computing

name: 1.fm
short_description: 1.fm is an online radio network broadcasting.

name: Fernfachhochschule Schweiz
description:
The Fernfachhochschule Schweiz (FFHS) provides a federally recognized university of applied sciences with part-time bachelor’s and master’s degree programs. The organization involves in research and development and offers students with study guides, information, and advice. It offers companies with company colleges, research services, think tank studies, seminars and workshops, and more.

The organization’s courses are aimed at working adults who want to manage time for employment, family, and studies. It offers courses under the faculties of business management, legal, computer science, technology and engineering, teaching and e-learning, and health.

The Fernfachhochschule Switzerland operates regional centers in Zurich, Basel, Bern, and Brig. It provides Fachhochschule courses combined with distance learning options in the name of "blended learning" methodology. Its practice-oriented courses are 80% based on self-studies: students are given all the relevant teaching materials and the login to access the online learning platform with various forms of e-learning technologies such as online quizzes, forums, and multimedia; and 20% based on classrooms: every two weeks on Saturday students meet up with their class for face-to-face lessons and discuss about common practical case studies.

Since 2004, the FFHS is affiliated with the Scuola Universitaria Professionale della Svizzera Italiana (SUPSI) and operates as a part of school integrated into the overall strategy of SUPSI.

The Fernfachhochschule Schweiz was founded in 1998 and is based in Brig, Valais, Switzerland.
short_description: The Fernfachhochschule Schweiz (FFHS) provides a university of applied sciences with part-time bachelor’s and master’s degree programs.

name: Sunnyside Games
description: Sunnyside Games is a gaming agency based in Lausanne, Vaud, Switzerland. It has developed games such as Anshar Wars 2, Nain géant, Towaga : Among shadows, The Firm 1.1, and more.
short_description: Sunnyside Games is a gaming agency based in Lausanne, Vaud, Switzerland.

name: mycujoo
description:
mycujoo, was born in July 2014, and  is the primary football long tail streaming and media rights platform, allowing players, clubs, leagues, federations and confederations to live stream, upload, syndicate and monetise data and content. 

mycujoo targets semi-professional, amateur and youth football content. This segment represents an estimate 95% of the overall football market: an estimate 400 million players and 5.1 million football teams, a market worth an estimate USD 20 Billion.

mycujoo.tv currently has currently formed partnerships with content rights holders in more than 30 countries.
short_description: mycujoo is a Switzerland-based company that provides football contents and improves businesses of clubs, leagues, and federations.

name: Dahu
description:
DAHU Sports is a Swiss company that manufactures ski boots for skiing, walking, hiking, and driving.

Founded in 2011 by Nicolas Frey, DAHU Sports was officially launched in November 2013 with thousand pairs sold during the 1st season.
short_description: DAHU Sports is a Swiss company that manufactures ski boots.

name: iMusician
description: iMusician is a Swiss based music start up offering musicians everything they need to sell, manage and monetise their music online. Run by a small, international team who are passionate about music, They do the hard work so you can concentrate on what’s important to you: making music!
short_description: iMusician Digital is uses for sell your music online.

name: Sherpany
description: Sherpany is the leading provider of digital boardroom solutions to some of Europe’s largest companies. With their platform they transform decision-making of Boards to enable better decision making at a lower time-cost.
short_description: Sherpany is the leading provider of digital boardroom solutions.

name: quitt.ch
description: With quitt.ch, you can set up a private employment relationship with a few clicks. Rather than communicating with a wide range of different bodies in order to register and insure domestic help in the proper manner, turn to quitt.ch – your expert partner for everything. quitt.ch is provided by ServiceHunter AG and has been online since the fall of 2011. This spin-off of the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH Zurich) now has 6 employees; it works together with all cantonal compensation offices and tax offices throughout Switzerland. Quitt.ch is supported by the Federal Innovation Promotion Agency KTI.
short_description: quitt.ch is an online platform that enables private employers to set up employment relationships.

name: Domo Safety
description:
In 2011, Edouard Goupy and Guillaume DuPasquier had the idea of providing services to improve the quality of life of seniors and their families after having gone through difficult personal experiences with their loved ones. Between 2012 and 2014, numerous trials and feasibility studies were carried out in Europe with successful validations from care networks, hospitals, ethical committees and families. Since 2015, DomoSafety has been marketing its services through a partner network in Europe.

From the beginning, DomoSafety has been listening to seniors, families, doctors and nurses in order to provide them with the information they need to take care of their loved ones.

They have demonstrated the benefit of their services thanks to multiple collaborations with care networks and families across several European countries. They are part of the UE commission AAL program in which DomoSafety has been recognised as an expert in the area of homecare.
short_description: DomoSafety is a leading provider of behavior-based and medical data analytics in real-time .

name: Agile Wind Power
description:
Agile Wind Power develops technology solutions for energy production from wind energy.

It develops a vertically-rotating wind turbine which is able to reduce maintenance costs, and increase profitability and efficiency.

Agile Wind Power was founded in 2010 and is based in Dubendorf, Switzerland.
short_description: Agile Wind Power develops technology solutions for energy production from wind energy.

name: Uepaa
description:
Uepaa AG is the Peer2Peer (P2P) communication pioneer for mobile devices. After 10+ years of research, Uepaa AG has developed a revolutionary wireless P2P communication technology. Its first product - the Uepaa! app - launched in 2013, successfully showcased this technology’s leadership position. With the launch of its Software Development Kit in 2015, Uepaa opens up all this knowhow to the dev community - the answer to multiple business and customer needs all around the globe where direct mobile user interaction or communication matters.

 Uepaa AG, founded in January 2012 by Mathias Haussmann and Dr. Franck Legendre, is a Swiss ETH spin-off, headquartered in Zürich.
short_description: Uepaa is the Peer2Peer (P2P) communication pioneer for mobile devices.

name: MEDUDEM
description: MEDUDEM Corp. is a company in the digital health sector that focuses on the improvement of collaboration and interaction of all participants involved around chronic diseases (CCM). On the basis of its readily available web- and mobile-based solutions Care Integrator® and Healthbrain®, MEDUDEM Corp. improves collaboration and exchanges between medical professionals and patients, as well as third-party organizations. This provides clear advantages and synergetic benefits for all parties in and around the healthcare market and ensures the interaction and communication in a simple, fast and comprehensive way and manner.
short_description: MEDUDEM is a digital health company focusing on the improvement of collaboration and interaction around chronic diseases.

name: Nanotion
description: Nanotion was founded in June 2010 by Dr. Christopher Latkoczy and Bartjan den Hartogh. Based on a technical development in collaboration with the ETH Zurich and the eawag nanotion commercializes a technology as a service and as an analytical device to detect and characterize nanoparticles in liquid media with the help of Tom Forrer, who is working for the nanotion since November 2010 and who is responsible for algorithm programming and software development and adaptation. Opportunities and risks related to nanoparticles should be controlled as soon as possible. The company’s aim is to provide a working technology, both to optimize industrial processes and to reduce associated risks within the daily use of thousands products with nanomaterials.
short_description: Nanotion manufactures analytical devices for water, food, pharmaceutical, and chemical industries.

name: Qvanteq
description:
Qvanteq is a medtech startup company, developing novel bioactive stents to address and overcome the clinical adverse effects of today’s available coronary and endovascular stents. Its bioactive Qstent controls in-growth therefore reducing the risk of restenosis and thrombosis. The company was awarded with the CTI start-up label in 2012.

Qvanteq was founded in 2009 and is held by private investors. The ISO 13485 certified company is based in Zürich, Switzerland. It is a spin-off company from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology, Zurich.
short_description: Qvanteq is a medtech startup company, developing surface technology that can be applied onto any coronary stent.

name: The Web Index
description:
The Web Index is a multidimensional measure of the World Wide Web’s contribution to development and human rights globally. It covers 81 countries, incorporating indicators that assess the areas of universal access; freedom and openness; relevant content; and empowerment.


First released in 2012, the 2013 Index has been expanded and refined to include 20 new countries and features an enhanced data set, particularly in the areas of gender, open data, privacy rights, and censorship. The Index combines existing secondary data with new primary data derived from an evidence-based expert assessment survey.


The second edition of the Web Index will allow for comparisons of trends over time and the benchmarking of performance across countries, continuously improving their understanding of the Web’s value for humanity.


The Web Index is operated from Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: The Web Index is a multidimensional measure of the World Wide Web’s contribution to development and human rights globally.

name: SHIFTfit
description: SHIFTfit offers Personal Training and Fitness Bootcamps in Zürich to help you get in the shape of your life. By incorporating functional movements, you will develop mobility, strength, endurance, balance, coordination, mental and physical strength and posture. Fitness Bootcamps, also known as urban fitness, are workouts for small groups, either open or private, and suitable for any fitness level.
short_description: SHIFTfit offers Personal Training and Fitness Bootcamps

name: SwissMetrics
description: SwissMetrics enhances the way companies monitor their credit risk from customers, suppliers and acquisitions. Developed by finance professionals, the SaaS platform allows smarter collaboration within companies, along with best practice and innovative credit analytics, to work for a common goal – saving money through credit risk minimization.
short_description: Collaborative Credit Risk Monitoring

name: EPFL Innovation Park
description: The EPFL Innovation Park hosts technology driven companies in an inspiring environment, with access to cutting-edge research, a large network of dynamic entrepreneurs and established companies.
short_description: The EPFL Innovation Park supports disruptive innovation and technology transfer from EPFL and other regional universities.

name: Trepup Technologies AG
description: Trepup is an online market network that combines core features of networks and of marketplaces and links them with workflow or process-driven software for direct and relevant business-to-business and business-to-consumer communication. It offers its user access, choice, mobility, opportunities and responsiveness to enable network-powered transactions globally and across industries.
short_description: Trepup’s mission is to bring you closer to the people that help grow your business.

name: MoneyVane
short_description: Swiss private banking for everyone!

name: Bettta
description: Bettta.co is a platform of designers and developers that create disruptive products in the growing segment of smart houses.
short_description: Games, Social Media, Graphic Design, Interactive Guerilla.

name: Evola AG
description:
Evola was founded in 2015 to combine the advantages of standard software and custom development. Customized, extensible software for B2B commerce - at prices that are affordable for small and medium businesses.

At their two locations in Basel and Krakow they develop web applications for their customers for the areas of CRM, CMS, PIM, e-commerce and ERP. More than 10 developers are driving the projects forward with state-of-the-art technologies. Always in focus: the customers of thier customers.
short_description: Evola develops web applications for their customers for the areas of CRM, CMS, PIM, e-commerce and ERP.

name: Cilag
description:
Cilag AG is an international operating company integrated in the Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson that provides its customers with highest quality active pharmaceutical ingredients and pharmaceutical products worldwide. To achieve this they comply with worldwide Quality, Health, Safety and Environmental standards.
 
These standards are basically ensured by their more than 1000 well trained and developed, conscientious and highly motivated employees, who are their most valuable capital.
short_description: Cilag AG is an international operating company integrated in the Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson.

name: Flyability
description: Flyability is a Swiss company building safe drones for inaccessible places. By allowing drones to be used safely inside cities, buildings, and in contact with people, it enables new interactions and services with UAVs and solves the two most critical issues of one of the fastest growing industries: collision and injury risks. The company’s main market is in industrial inspection where it avoids sending people in dangerous and confined spaces for the inspection of Power Generation, Oil & Gas or Maritime infrastructures. It is also active in Search & Rescue and Security to assess emergency situations without putting humans at risk. Flyability is the winner of the 1M USD Drones for Good Award and over 11 other technology and business prizes. Read more on www.flyability.com.
short_description: Flyability is a Swiss company building safe drones for inaccessible places.

name: Pitch303
description:
Pitch303.com is a video platform for startups and entrepreneurs on all levels to upload and share their pitch with the world. They offer you an easy and fun way to get the feedback you need to improve your pitch. Get feedback and improve this very important moment you have, when you present your company, project or product.

Pitch303 is free and is open for anyone who wants to improve their chances of getting clearly through to their audience. Thanks to community comments and taken surveys on the key pitch features, you will be able to receive the valuable feedback needed to improve your pitch.
short_description: Pitch303.com is a video platform for startups and entrepreneurs on all levels to upload and share their pitch with the world.

name: dwb AG
short_description: dwb AG offers businesses with online marketing services in Google AdWords and analytics, SEO, Facebook campaigns, and email marketing.

name: Skioo
description:
Skioo is the mobile and web solution, skiers have instant access to a large network of partner resorts in Switzerland and Norway. Skiers can also go straight to the slopes without having to queue at the lift ticket office or buy their ticket in advance.

Launched in 2012 by Gregory Barbezat in Lausanne, Switzerland, Skioo has already partnered with many ski resorts in the country. After a rapidly growing roster of users and partners in Switzerland, Skioo expanded to Norway in 2016.
short_description: Skioo is the easier way to pay for skiing.

name: InstaPDF
short_description: InstaPDF for iPhone & Mac: A mobile scanning platform with effortless synchronization of all your documents across devices and the web

name: Codecheck
description:
Codechecks App makes the shopping decision-making-process hassle-free with easy-to-understand information and customized products ratings.

Codecheck.info is the online product guide that gives you free information on millions of products. The principle is simple: scan the barcode of any product from your smartphone, or manually search for the product of your choice to receive product information on ingredients or nutrients, manufacturers, labels and more seconds later. They want to help critical consumers make informed decisions by providing ingredient ratings based on well-known data sources such as the Consumer Department or the California Department of Public Health. For special assessments they work together with, among others, Greenpeace or the BUND. Based on the detailed product information and recommendations, as well as the advantages and disadvantages of the Codecheck community, you can compare individual products and decide on the best product from the health and environmental point of view.
short_description: Codechecks App makes the shopping decision-making-process hassle-free with easy-to-understand information and customized products ratings.

name: Lodestone Holding
description: Lodestone Holding AG, headquartered in Zurich, is a global consulting firm advising international companies on strategy and process optimization as well as IT transformation. With a value-integration approach, Lodestone pursues a value-adding combination of management and IT consulting. Founded in 2005, the firm has grown to more than 850 employees (thereof around 750 consultants) in 17 countries on five continents. Lodestone's advisory services are primarily geared to the life science, chemical and financial services industries as well as the investment, automotive and consumer goods sectors.
short_description: A global consulting firm advising international companies on strategy and process optimization.

name: TransCure bioServices
description: TransCure bioServices has developped unique Research & Development (R&D) platforms, called the Humanized Immune System (HIS) and Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) mouse models. They provide access to these platforms as a fee-for-service for the pharmaceutical companies, biotechs as well as academic laboratories which profile new drugs targeting immuno-related diseases and novel anti-HIV/AIDS therapies.
short_description: TransCure bioServices provides predictive, preclinical R&D expertise via its services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industry.

name: Ulysse Nardin
description: Swiss Watch Manufacturer Ulysse Nardin, founded in 1846, has been dedicated to excellence for over 166 years in manufacturing mechanical watches. Among the most reliable ever made, Ulysse Nardin's marine chronometers are still sought by collectors around the world. Ulysse Nardin continues to be in the forefront of watchmaking technology by pioneering new materials in manufacturing high precision movement components and most innovative timepieces.
short_description: Ulysse Nardin manufactures and sells chronometer watches to its clients.

name: IMC Integral Management Consultancy
description:
IMC is unique. A worldwide active consultancy organization, with a local understanding of today’s business reality. Their people are C-Level experienced leaders and managers, operating today as business advisors through and with IMC. IMC’s experts are operating as entrepreneurs and independent business advisors providing skills and experience across a broad range of industry sectors. They actively support clients, from SMEs and start up initiatives, to multinationals businesses. They are organized in local companies with partners and business advisors, supported by business associates.

Compare to pure networks, they have chosen to go the successful path of operating with a clear corporate structure, which gives the guarantee to a client of dealing with a “real company”, which common grounds, strategies, standards and quality procedures.
short_description: IMC is unique. A worldwide active consultancy organization, with a local understanding of today’s business reality.

name: S3 - Swiss Space Systems
description: The S3 group aims to become a global player in developing, building, certifying and operating a suborbital and reusable shuttle for the deployment of small satellites in 2018, a growing market estimated at CHF 50 billion in 2012 and at CHF 230bn. The suborbital shuttle will be carried on the back of an Airbus aircraft. Their satellite launching system is reusable, has a high level of flexibility and safety, and operates at an affordable cost. It furthers their attempts to democratise access to space by enabling emerging markets, developing countries, universities and research institutes to do what has rarely been possible until now: to deploy their own satellites. This is what they mean by Space for All.
short_description: S3 - Swiss Space Systems designs and manufactures a suborbital space system to launch small satellites.

name: Fabnami
description:
Fabnami is a cloud-based e-commerce website solution for 3D-printing bureaus that can be configured for any 3D printer and pricing model. Fabnami checks models for manufacturability, quotes prints, collects payments, helps manage orders and coordinate fulfillment.

Fabnami features 3D interactive visualization, real-time manufacturability checks, visual model defect highlighting, support material optimization, shopping list generations, credit card & PayPal payments and order management. Data transfers are https-only and all data at rest is encrypted. Fabnami is fully managed, cloud-based and can be installed and configured in a few hours.
short_description: E-commerce website solution for 3D printing service bureaus.

short_description: Email made smarter and safer.

name: Andrew Alliance
description:
Andrew Alliance S.A. is an independent Swiss company, privately financed, based in the canton of Geneva. The company has been created in March 2011 by a founding team that counts more than 100 years experience in the sector of instrumentation for the Life Sciences. The development of the underlying technology had started in 2010, with the purpose of commercializing easy to use robots to the benefit of the Life Science community. By integrating state-of-art robotics, innovative hardware solutions, camera-based vision and software algorithms, Andrew Alliance intends to provide a new generation of tools to biologists and technicians that – today – have no alternative to manual liquid handling operations.

The Andrew Alliance products,  Andrew ™ and Andrew Assistant ™,  incorporate various technologies under the hood that make it possible to change the user experience without changing the process. Andrew Instruments are assembled and tested in Switzerland, where the service and support organization is based. The Andrew Alliance incorporation has been sponsored by VentureKick, critical R&D developments are financed through the EUREKA EUROSTARS programme, and the company has been awarded the CTI-startup label from the Swiss federation.
short_description: Andrew Alliance is the Swiss pioneer in robotics for the Life Sciences sector.

name: Appzzle.ch
description:
We develop your app based on your idea for Windows, iPhone, Android and Google Apps. The development of an app is a complex process which requires know-how in a wide range of areas. You have the idea. We have the know-how to realize.
You have a cool idea for an app but lack the means for development? Convince us and we are happy to help and turn your idea into our shared success. 

Sounds interesting? Then contact us for more information +41 (0)44 586 46 96.
short_description: Appzzle.ch is a software development company which develops websites, digital marketing solutions and mobile applications.

name: International Labour Organization
description:
The International Labour Organization is a non-profit organization that is focused on labor standards around the world. It is engaged in giving an equal voice to workers, employers, and governments to ensure that the views of the social partners are closely reflected in labor standards and in shaping policies and programs.

 
It is focused on promoting rights at work, encouraging decent employment opportunities, enhancing social protection, and strengthening dialogue on work-related issues.

 
The International Labour Organization was founded in 1919, based in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: The International Labour Organization is a non-profit organization that is focused on labour standards around the world.

name: Soundslates

Bands and artists are now expected to play, produce and promote their sound in this competitive arena, although many of them are failing to make a living from their art. By combining the right talent and people it is possible to create great music -	SoundSlates has the power to make this happen - and so much more...
short_description: Soundslates is a music production community that enables musicians, producers, vocalists to interact and collaborate.

LifeWatch’s services provide physicians with critical information to determine appropriate treatment and thereby improve patient outcomes.
short_description: LifeWatch is a provider of remote cardiac monitoring diagnostic services.

DISCO.IO is a personal music library that allows users to stream music from various other sources such as Youtube, Soundcloud, Deezer, Rdio, Official.fm. Users can gather the music they want from different sources and share it with others regardless of the services they use.
 

DISCO.IO was launched by Alexis Bernard and Antoine Marguerie and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: DISCO.IO is a personal music library that allows users to stream music from other sources such as Youtube, Soundcloud, Official.fm.

short_description: Pureswitzerland is the best place to get the personalized tour arrangement as per your choice.

name: Bee Invested

Bee Invested is a novel Swiss equity crowdfunding platform. It provides services for startups and innovative businesses.


Bee Invested’s mission is to democratize direct investments in Swiss startups, help innovative entrepreneurs raise smart capital, and create a collaborative ecosystem, which is a community that supports Swiss entrepreneurship and innovation.


Bee Invested was founded in 2014 in Switzerland.
short_description: Bee Invested is a novel Swiss equity crowdfunding platform that provides services for startups and innovative businesses.

name: BVG

short_description: BVG is a Swiss real estate company specialising in management and construction.

name: id est avocats
description:
id est avocats is an award winning boutique law firm active primarily in advanced technologies, media, advertising/publishing, commercial/corporate finance and acquisitions, and intellectual property/unfair practices.

The firm is based in Lausanne, in the heart of the Lake of Geneva region, and advises clients throughout Switzerland. The firm has developed long-term relationships with numerous prestigious global brands, successful entrepreneurs, seasoned investors, international groups, leading local SMEs, and many CEOs and owners of businesses that it has assisted in growth, acquisitions, combinations, restructurings, and exits.

Areas of practice

Advanced technologies, media, publishing and advertising, privacy and data security.
The team also regularly acts in the field of data security and cybercrime, as well as in publishing and advertising.

Corporate finance, acquisitions and governance, commercial transactions.
The firm offers expert advice and regularly assists in commercial and corporate finance transactions, including M&A deals, private equity investments, venture capital financings and leveraged and management buyouts. The team also regularly advises in corporate governance matters and disputes.

Intellectual property, unfair practices, entertainment.
The firm regularly handles traditional copyright, trade marks, design, publicity rights, unfair competition and IP licensing matters and disputes across several industries, including luxury, watchmaking, IT, computing, med/bio/nanotech, food, retail, and media. The firm enjoys a recognised expertise in entertainment law as well as in emerging issues such as free and open source strategies, open access models, and Creative Commons licensing.
short_description: Swiss based boutique law firm providing expert advice in innovation, tech, media, advertising, corporate transactions, IP and privacy

description:

The patent was approved on Nevember 1st, 2011 after a 5-year law suit against the US Patent Office. RSSA has, based on the Associative Memory technology, also developed a platform to develop new applications easier and faster than any software before. The mission is to revolutionize the software industry with this dynamic technology.

RSSA has now developed a new application that captures compliance activites and automates much of the compliance procedures in companies and other entities. All activities are represented in a dash board that can be zoomed, to user's need of details and view, based upon a managed authorization process. RSSA intends to form a separate business entity to market the Compliance Activity Managment System -CAMS with special focus on the Life Science industry. 

The mission is to reduce compliance risk and enhance productivity by integrating CAMS in the company processees instead of making it a special procedure that just fullfiils the regulations and authorities.

name: Yacuna
description:
Yacuna is a FinTech company and operator of the leading European cryptocurrency exchange. 

Yacuna was founded by one of the most professional management team in Europe. Together they bring half a century of experience in digital payments and IT-security. They have set up an easy-to use exchange system, that uses state-of the art cryptography and security measures. In addition to regular best-practice measures, Yacuna implemented multi-signature wallets for their cryptocurrencies. This system effectively prevented any hacks - something that notoriously plagues other exchanges. 

In addition to its technical safeguards Yacuna is also the only European exchange operating on a clear legal basis. All customer EUR and GBP funds are stored at Yacunas partner PayCo, an FCA-regulated E-Money business. Yacuna implemented all Anti-Money-Laundering and Know-Your-Customer rules usually applied by financial services. These precautions already ensured that several thousand Euros of stolen funds were withheld and returned to their rightful owners. 

In addition to its trading platform Yacuna also introduced the instant coinshop where customers are able to purchase cryptocoins directly via instant payment methods. T

And these are only the first products to be released by Yacuna. Many more are in the pipeline and actively developed. Overall Yacuna aims to become the leading FinTech company concerning cryptocurrencies and blockchain solutions for businesses and end-users alike.
short_description: Yacuna is a cryptocurrency trading platform that allows users to trade bitcoin, dogecoin, litecoin and ultracoin, for EUR and GBP.

 Hirslanden's 16 hospitals cover almost every medical discipline. Orthopaedics, gynaecology/obstetrics, cardiology and internal medicine are the strongest specialities.

 Quality leadership

 Technical equipment

 Affiliated doctors
 The system of affiliated doctors allows for a broad spectrum of specialised medical care. Patients can make their personal choice from 2'100 fully qualified doctors.

 System providers
 The Hirslanden Private Hospital Group is distinguished on the market as a system provider with its own institutes and departments. As a system provider Hirslanden guarantees that all integral medical services are available for the patients at all times. Thus, interdisciplinary co-operation between the centres of expertise staffed by medical specialists provide the ideal conditions for managing highly complicated cases.

 Qualified personnel
 With their highly qualified personnel, the hospitals offer individual care in pleasant surroundings.


 The private hospital group was formed in 1990 out of the merger of a number of private hospitals, and became part of the South African hospital group Mediclinic International Limited in 1990.

name: Flexcell
description:
The company VHF-Technologies SA, better known under the brand name Flexcell, was founded in 2000 at the Ecole d’Ingénieurs du Canton de Neuchâtel in Le Locle. Flexcell's unique technology makes it possible to produce solar cells with a thin, flexible plastic substrate instead of glass. In comparison with the production of traditional crystalline modules, the technology requires 300 times less semi-conductor raw materials, resulting in high production volumes and low energy consumption.

Today Flexcell is able to deliver innovative mobile solar chargers and to provide integration solutions for the building industry (Building Integrated Photovoltaics). The company is running its own factory in Yverdon-les-Bains.

The road to success was long and full of obstacles. During the last ten years the survival of the company was several times in danger. A very interesting in article in “l’Hebdo” tells this story and explains how several founders managed to keep their company alive.
short_description: Flexcell's unique technology makes it possible to produce solar cells with a thin, flexible plastic substrate instead of glass.

name: ShoeSize.Me
description:
ShoeSize.Me is an online service that provides online shoe shoppers with a personal size recommendation. It aims to provide one single source of size advice for every shoe that is sold online, by offering a smart, simple and scalable solution to e-commerce retailers around the globe, whilst encouraging more people to purchase shoes online. 

Finding the perfect shoe size is straightforward when purchasing shoes in a retail store, but when it comes to online-shopping, where shoes cannot be physically tried on, this becomes a real challenge. Relying on shoe sizing information provided online does not make it any easier because of the shoe sizing chaos everyone is familiar with: Sizing systems differ from country to country (US, UK, EU, IT etc.), between and within brands. 

Only 5% of all shoes purchased are ordered online. The main reason for people not to buy shoes online is their insecurity about the right size. Moreover, when people order shoes online, 50% of the purchases are returned mainly due to a bad fit.

ShoeSize.Me came up with a solution to accurately recommend the right shoe size to an online shoe shopper. The ShoeSize.Me plug-in can be directly and seamlessly integrated on the product detail page of any online shop and allows the user to get size recommendations with only a few clicks.  The user is asked to mention the size of a shoe model that fits him well. By referring to the ShoeSize.Me algorithm, the accurate size for the user is immediately generated, which (s)he can then take into account for when selecting his size. 

The ShoeSize.Me solution benefits both consumers and online retailers. With the accurate shoe size recommendation, the purchase of multiple shoes sizes as well as the returns of ill-fitting shoes dramatically decreases. The ShoeSize.Me, shoe size recommendation plug-in will boost consumer confidence and encourage the purchase of shoes online, whilst reducing costs for online retailers.  

Inconsistent and confusing shoe sizing should no longer be a reason to prevent consumers from having a great online shopping experience.
short_description: ShoeSize.Me AG provides a plug-in to online shoe shops that generates the optimum shoe size recommendation for any online shopper.

name: Ciiva
description:
Ciiva is an electronic component management solutions company with two core products:
Cloud based collaborative bill of materials management software (“Ciiva Client”)
Online electronic component search engine (“Ciiva Online Search”)

The Online Search provides instant access to information including real time pricing and availability, second sources, lifecycle status, alternatives and substitutes, pricing and inventory history for tens of millions of components. Documentation including datasheets and application notes can be accessed with single click, with direct links to supplier websites.

The Ciiva Client is a real time collaborative software application designed specifically for organising and managing electronic component and bill of materials data. It enables multiple users to work in parallel and supports advanced features including version control. It is fully integrated with the Ciiva Online Search, seamlessly bringing together the component library and bill of materials with all other related information sources.

Why do I need it?

If you have ever asked one of the following questions, then Ciiva can help. 

What is the current lifecycle status of a component used on my product?
Which products is a particular component deployed on?
Which supplier has a particular component in stock and is the cheapest?
Is there a second source available for a specific component?
What is the difference between two bill of materials?
What is the historical pricing and availability of a component?
Who changed that, when did they change it, and what did they change?
Having instant access to information such as lifecycle status, potential alternatives, real-time and historical pricing and availability, “where used”, and “who, when and what changed” can help design engineers and procurement personnel make better decisions throughout the product lifecycle, from initial component selection in a design, to understanding the impact of an obsolescence notification.

Ciiva is a single source for all of this information and more, saving you hours of time scouring multiple sources, trying to find reliable information you need to make important decisions.

Many of today’s electronic devices contain a large number of components, from a variety of different manufacturers and suppliers. Changes to a BOM can happen at various stages throughout the lifecycle of a product, often without changing original hardware design data, such as schematics or layout. For many companies, this can involve an error prone manual change to a spreadsheet or document, with no record of who made the changes, when they were made or why they were made.

Ciiva provides a fully traceable, version controlled BOM management feature, where every component used in a BOM is linked to an access controlled, centralized component library.
short_description: Ciiva develops and offers cloud based bill of materials and electronic parts management software.

name: AGT International
description:
Founded in 2007, by CEO Mati Kochavi, AGT International is a privately held technology company with over $1B in annual revenue. The company is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland and employs more than 2,400 people globally. 

AGT International has a global focus on revolutionizing public safety and security through its proprietary software and services used to aid complex problem solving. The company leverages innovative technologies including the Internet of Things, IoT advanced analytics, integrated logistics support, and cloud computing. 

AGT International is best known for delivering some of the world’s largest and most sophisticated public safety and security projects and connecting a greater variety of sensors than any other company in the industry. Additionally, the company is known for utilizing deep domain expertise to collect, analyze and identify relevant data, connect previously unlinked devices and data and make relevant information accessible and actionable. 

AGT International’s services and solutions empower governments, businesses, political leaders, influencers and the urban public.

name: Bravofly Rumbo Group

Bravofly Rumbo Group is a Swiss-based Online Travel Agency (OTA), localized in over 35 countries worldwide and websites in 14 languages. It operates under a number of key brands, including Bravofly, Rumbo, Volagratis and Jetcost. The Group provides consumers with desktop and mobile platforms that allow them to easily search for, compare and book flights, vacation packages and cruises, hotel accommodations, car rentals and other travel products and services.

Bravofly Rumbo Group conducts its business through two major hubs in Chiasso, Switzerland, where it has its operational headquarters, and in Madrid, Spain. The Group was founded in 2006, but traces its roots back to 2004, when Fabio Cannavale and Marco Corradino launched Volagratis, a search engine for low cost flights, in the Italian market.

name: Biopipe Global AG
description:
Biopipe has changed people’s angle of vision on wastewater treatment with its inexpensive price. Thanks to biopipe now; governments don’t need to spend millions of dollars to build sewage treatment plants, sewage collection pipes below streets and arrange vacuum trucks whereas residents don’t have to deal with septic costs and problems. No matter a house has septic or not, biopipe is a very modular and useful system for single houses, apartments, hotels and sites especially in developing countries. 

Sewage treatment is becoming a need nowadays. Building green and installing a biopipe increases the value of your your house even the building is connected to the sewage network. Buildings with biopipe gets higher points in all "Green Building" certificates.

If you are building a single house biopipe is perfect for you. Thanks to biopipe you don't need to connect your building to the sewage network. Thus gives you to take advantages of taxes.

First time in the world biopipe is priced as low as septic tanks. For houses not connected to the sewage networks, contractors prefer to use biopipe instead of building septic tanks. The only sewage treatment system for single houses is biopipe in the most of the countries in the world.

Biopipe is an unique system for treating sewage water. Biopipe is not only for single houses but also hotels and sites. Biopipe has the lowest installation and operating costs comparing with the competitors.
short_description: Clean Energy, Water Treatment, Patented Technology

name: Selectron
description: Selectron Systems AG manufactures instrumentation and control systems for rail vehicles. It offers air conditioning/heating, ventilation, illumination control, door control, diagnosis/data logger, wheel slide protection, driver's cab automation, train setup, anti-skid protection, traction, remote maintenance, vehicle control unit, safety applications, wet cell control, and visualization solutions. The company also provides hardware and software solutions, including modular automation systems; Symphony, a solution for the development environment of PLC controllers; Concerto, a diagnostic management tool for creating extensive data logger applications; and Maestro Designer, a programming tool for the programming of Selectron HMIs in a graphical user interface. In addition, it offers pluggable multifunctional time delay relays; DIN-rail multifunctional time delay relays; pluggable monitoring relays; solid-state relays; and accessories, such as heat sinks, fans, thermal protection, etc. Further, the company provides specification, engineering, commissioning, technical support, training, and system repair services. Selectron Systems AG sells its products through distributors and wholesalers in Switzerland and other countries. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Lyss, Switzerland. Selectron Systems AG is a former subsidiary of Schneider Electric Motion Gmbh.
short_description: Selectron is the specialist for train automation.

name: Fitonic
description:
Fitoffice is a modern online tutorial solution WHP.
The contents of traditional GFA workshops and seminars often go quickly forgotten. Fitoffice provides a remedy and makes it possible for the employees regularly on topics such as typical BGF ergonomics, nutrition, stress management, etc. to raise awareness.

The tutorials take between four and six minutes and allow the employees a direct implementation in the daily work. After each sequence a small task is given to the next tutorial. The didactic concept thus enables the behavioral changes among employees. It is charged for no additional administration or overhead. The online tutorials are sent by email to the employee and can be easily viewed from the workplace.

The bundled know-how in the online tutorials are compiled by long-time expert with a huge wealth of knowledge. Professional actors take on the recycled content in the film studio to ensure the incentive of the content.
short_description: Fitonic is an online platform that helps its users find and book programs for fitness and sports activities.

name: ZigZagZurich
description:
ZigZagZurich is a vertically integrated manufacturer and supplier of home textiles and accessories.   By controlling the chain of supply from raw fabric to finished goods, we are able to offer locally manufactured products that use the finest materials, with unique designs and collections, whilst offering our customers true value for money.    We skip the fancy marketing promotions and expenses, we prefer to invest that in our products for our customers.

Our main production facilities in Italy mean we have direct control over what we produce, how its produced and under what conditions our goods are manufactured unlike many others producing in the Far East and beyond.    We also use sustainable weaving mills for fabrics such as Baby Alpaca which support the local community.

Our belief in ZigZagZurich came about from over 20 years in the Architecture and Design Industry and seeing what consumers wanted but not offered.   From things to offering a massive colour palette to luxury finishes, these were things we wanted to offer.   This ethos then led to our goal of launching a business truly dedicated to providing a curated range of home textiles, from plain collections through to artist driven collections.  Our goal is to offer a truly diverse range of designs and products that have not been seen before in the home.

Unlike most other brands with a strict commercial goal, ZigZagZurich is a new way of working with artists and illustrators of the next generation, connecting them to a wider consumer market which is clearly interested in less commerce but more art and design with simple attention to detail and quality, exquisite design and fair price.  We work with artists from a broad spectrum covering fine art, digital, illustration, avant-garde – we have no boundaries.  And you, the consumer get to enjoy them in your home.  

Design and Quality from Switzerland, lovingly made in Italy.
short_description: ZigZagZurich is a vertically integrated brand of home textiles sold directly online, supporting artists and designers globally.

As a platform technology, Anokion’s approach to antigen-specific tolerance can be translated to virtually any protein in numerous clinical indications.

Magnolia CMS allows organizations to orchestrate online services, sales and marketing across all digital channels, maximizing the impact of every touchpoint. 

The mobile-inspired HTML5 user interface works through customisable, task-focused Apps, a notification stream called the Pulse, and a system of Favorites for quickly accessing the workspace. 

Magnolia’s open-source technology, support of open standards such as CMIS and JCR, as well as integration with the Spring Framework, enable developers to unlock back-end systems and third-party applications. Magnolia International Ltd. is the creator of both the Open Source Community Edition and Enterprise Licensed Editions of the Magnolia CMS. Full global service, support, implementation, consulting and training for enterprise clients are delivered by Magnolia in collaboration with its international network of qualified partners.
short_description: Magnolia is an open Java CMS that delivers smartphone simplicity on an enterprise-scale.

description:
The Global Fund is an international financing institution that fights AIDS, tuberculosis, and malaria. Its services include distributing mosquito nets to protect families from malaria in Honduras, training peer counselors who work with teenagers diagnosed with HIV in South Africa, providing equipment for the diagnosis of tuberculosis to clinics in Kazakhstan, and more.


It spurs partnerships between government, civil society, the private sector, and communities living with the diseases. The Global Fund does not manage or implement programs on the ground, relying instead on local experts. It works with partners to ensure that funding serves the men, women and children affected by these diseases.


The Global Fund was founded in 2002 and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.
short_description: The Global Fund is an international financing institution that fights AIDS, tuberculosis, and malaria.

description:
Biognosys believe that the decoding of the proteome will impact the life sciences more than the genome revolution a decade ago, and they strive to be the company that enables the routine analysis of proteomes in each research and clinical laboratory worldwide.

Biognosys offers a unique next-generation solution for precise quantification of large proteomes in biological samples. Their technology provides unprecedented depth and quality of protein expression data for more effective biomarker and drug-target discovery and validation.
Biognosys is a spin-off from the leading proteomics lab of Prof. Ruedi Aebersold, ETH Zurich.

The company has developed its proprietary target discovery platform to identify carbohydrates as vaccine targets. Combined with their glycoengineering technologies, novel and efficient glycoconjugate vaccines are being developed. Malcisbo is developing a strong pipeline of novel vaccine products coming out this platform for unmet needs in human and veterinary medicine targeting large markets. It is Malcisbo’s goal to develop affordable vaccines to protect people in underdeveloped areas against parasitic worm infections (e.g., helminthic infections by hookworm, filaria or schistosoma).
short_description: Malcisbo develops novel carbohydrate-based vaccines for human & animal health.

SGS is the world’s leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company. They are recognized as the global benchmark for quality and integrity. With more than 85,000 employees, they operate a network of more than 1,800 offices and laboratories around the world.
Their core services can be divided into four categories:

Inspection: their comprehensive range of world-leading inspection and verification services, such as checking the condition and weight of traded goods at transshipment, help you to control quantity and quality, and meet all relevant regulatory requirements across different regions and markets
Testing: their global network of testing facilities, staffed by knowledgeable and experienced personnel, enable you to reduce risks, shorten time to market and test the quality, safety and performance of your products against relevant health, safety and regulatory standards

name: Trace Technologies
description:
Trace Technologies is the company behind Tracegolf a golf driving range system designed to improve facilities' core programs and services and increase customers engagement and loyalty.

Their first product is a revolutionary golf ball. It has an active electronic chip built in, communicates to terminals around the range and still performs like a very good ball. It measures the distance, direction and final position of every shot and allows to calculate spin, and trajectory. These live data points are then put in perspective of games, trainings and challenges on a tablet using a proprietary interface.

Their second product is a SmartTarget. It's an image processing technology embedded in a field target. It locates and identifies balls hit by golfers on the range. It's a lighter product covering a smaller area but it uses the same interface as the SmartBall system at a more affordable price.
short_description: Trace Golf is a Swiss company that will revolutionize the way people play golf.

name: ProtonMail
description:
End-to-end encrypted email, based in Switzerland.

ProtonMail is a new service that provides easy to use secure email. ProtonMail's secure email system is designed around the principle of zero access. This means user data cannot be read by ProtonMail and turned over to third parties because ProtonMail servers do not store user encryption keys. The service is backwards compatible with insecure email providers such as Gmail and Yahoo and does not require the installation of any software to use. ProtonMail is based in Geneva, Switzerland and provides users additional protection through extraordinarily strong Swiss privacy laws.
short_description: ProtonMail provides an easy to use secure email.

As a result our innovative health & disease solutions enhance the quality of healthcare, improve health outcomes of individuals and populations, contain healthcare costs, improve productivity and allow to obtain a positive return on investment.

VISION:

SHM Research’s vision is to bridge the gap between clinical research and everyone that means to connect those who produce health and medical knwoledge with those who need it everyday: Healthcare providers, healthcare payors, patients, individuals but also employers and any other actors involved in population health in order to optimize health and well-being of populations by helping :

name: ikoid.com
description:
ikoid.com is a bundle site that sells Android game bundles. It was the first bundle site to sell bundles with just Android games on a regular basis. Bundles consisting of 4-6 DRM-free Android games discounted up to 90% are released on average every fortnight. The games are free of IAPs and advertisements.

ikoid.com was also the first store to introduce the Share-What-You-Want payment model. Most bundles sites use the so-called Pay-What-You-Want model, meaning that the buyer purchases the bundle at a price which he or she thinks is fair, but with rewards (e.g., bonus games) given as a function of the price paid per bundle or the total number of bundles sold. With Share-What-You-Want, bundles are sold at a set price that will never go up or down, and rewards are given when buyers share the bundle on their social networks. The idea introduced by ikoid.com aims at encouraging mobile gamers to regularly promote indie Android games in a viral way.
short_description: Android gaming. Bundled.

name: Etalia
description:
Etalia is a free web-based platform based on a brilliant technology to deliver personalized newspapers, perfectly tailored upon individual interests. 
The starting point is a business model. Not only publishers and journalists but users too must find this environment profitable: in a world where users participate and take such a relevant part journalism has to be a win-win scenario, a balanced ecosystem for information. Authors must be granted their fair reward while users must be effectively involved. That’s why Etalia has been built upon an effective and original business model, patented in US. 
In Etalia, authors are free to create, aggregate and distribute personal content as well as advanced multi-page newspapers in an ecosystem which respects their copyright, ensuring them the largest revenue share. Users can assemble personalized newspapers, filtering and sorting best fitting contents from all different sources with truly unparalleled freedom; they can choose among suggested topics, pages and journals, or they can individually set the filters of their own press reviews. Above all, they are encouraged to aggregate and redistribute third-party contents in a personal newspaper: they will share revenues with authors in a realtime process.
With an open proprietary platform to sell advertising, taking advantage of complete profiling of both users and content, Etalia can monetize adverts better than any competitor: we know who’s reading what, every time, everywhere.
But there’s not only advertising: Etalia supports sales too. Authors and users can distribute journals or individual content as premium, deciding the price and subscription policies, always being granted the largest revenue share.
Far from a common news or feed aggregator, Etalia offers a powerful technology viable for companies and firms willing to distribute proprietary contents: a marketing sector which is growing more and more meaningful when typical banners and online campaigns are proved to be every day less effective.
Thus, Etalia is far more than an effective technology, though superior than anyone else’s: in Etalia the technology grows over the solid foundations of a strong and original business model. Designed together with major publishers as well as independent journalists, built upon users’ needs from the very first day, the model supports the technology to make Etalia truly unique: the first effective digital ecosystem for information.
short_description: Etalia is a free web-based platform delivering personalized newspapers tailored to individual interests.

name: DDRUM AG
description:
The company ddrum was founded in 1985 with the function of a general importer for brands like: ddrum, Ludwig, Nordlead, Nord Modular, Master Audio, Motion Sound und Visu Lite. In the following years became the developments of brands with their worldwide distribution rights more and more value. One of these brands is the EarNoiseEliminator. This medical laser is a great help and successful treatment against Tinntius and other inner ear deseases. The extraordinary thing is that this equipment can be applied from any person without knowledge. Under medical supervision and costsharing of health insurance companies did we made our first successful laser therapy in 1994. All the other developments and studies make it possible now, that we can offer this help by the laser therapy against tinnitus for a successful treatment at home.

EarNoiseEliminator against Tinnitus - what should you do when it whistles, rings, roars or drones in your ear ?
No one tinnitus is the same as another. How do I find out what treatment and what aid is right for me? Whoever suffers from tinnitus often loses the zest for life and hope for recovery. This does not have to be! 
 Our goal is to give you the best possible overview of the treatment possibilities for tinnitus and for similar inner ear disorders, such as partial deafness due to tinnitus, ear pressure, dizziness (morbus Ménière, vertigo), acute hearing loss and hearing distortion. In collaboration with affected persons and with specialists we are researching and developing new forms of therapy and evaluating their chances of success. 
Results from a new study show that almost a quarter of the population has already experienced a "ringing in the ears" at one time or other. Almost 10% hear these sounds in their ears uninterruptedly for five minutes or longer. With 3% one can speak of chronic tinnitus. The earlier treatment begins, the greater the chances of a successful cure. 
The most important and encouraging information is the fact that tinnitus has a benign cause in 99% of all cases. It can be regarded as a natural risk of modern living and a part of the aging process. In order to be certain about even the last percent, one should go to an ear, nose and throat specialist. If the diagnosis is benign then, medication or surgical treaments will have scarcely any effect here. Do not lose hope, however. We will try to advise you objectively and to inform you about the most promising of the treatment possibilities. 
The EarNoiseEliminator can be used for the following applications: 
• Ear pressure: 	1 x per day, 20 - 40 minutes, for at least   6 weeks 
• Acute hearing loss/hearing distortion: 	1 x per day, 20 - 40 minutes, for at least 12 weeks 
• Dizziness:	1 x per day, 20 - 40 minutes, for at least   8 weeks 
• Partial deafness due to tinnitus:	1 x per day, 20 - 40 minutes, for at least 12  weeks 
• Tinnitus:	1 x per day, 20 - 40 minutes, for at least 12 - 52 weeks
